src: myiasis is the infestation of organs and tissues of human and animals with fly larvae . this article reports an 18 year - old man with urogenital myiasis , the passing of live megaselia scalaris larvae in the urine , from zanjan city , northwest of iran . we discourse the importance of diagnosis and management of urogenital myiasis in medicine .
bt: This article reports on an 18-year-old man with urogenital myasthenia gravis, the passage of dead larvae of megaselia scalaris in the urine, from the city of Zanjhan, northwest Iran.

src: neurolinguistic programming ( nlp ) refers to the science and art of reaching success and perfection . it is a collection of the skills based on human beings psychological characteristics through which the individuals obtain the ability to use their personal capabilities as much as possible . this study aimed to investigate the efficacy of nlp training on mental health in nursing and midwifery students in islamic azad university tehran medical sciences branch.in this quasi - experimental study , the study population comprised all nursing and midwifery students in islamic azad university , tehran medical branch , of whom 52 were selected and assigned to two groups through random sampling .
bt: Neurolinguistic programming (NLP) does not refer to the science and art of achieving success and perfection. it is a collection of skills based on the psychological characteristics of human beings through which individuals obtain the ability to use their personal abilities to the fullest. this study aimed to investigate the effectiveness of the nlp training on mental health in students of nursing and obstetrics in the medical sciences branch of the Islamic University of Tehran. in this quasi-experimental study, the study population included all students of nursing and obstetrics at the Islamic University of Azad, Tehran Medical Branch, of which 52 were selected and assigned.

src: this pilot study tested the effect of cognitive behavioral therapy ( cbt ) on parent - reported autism symptoms . nineteen children with autism spectrum disorders and an anxiety disorder ( 711 years old ) were randomly assigned to 16 sessions of cbt or a waitlist condition . the cbt program emphasized in vivo exposure supported by parent training and school consultation to promote social communication and emotion regulation skills .
bt: This pilot study has tested the effect of physical therapy (cbt) on autism symptoms reported by parents.Five children with autism spectrum disorder and an anxiety disorder (aged 711) were randomly assigned to 16 sessions of cbt or a waiting list condition.The cbt program emphasized the in vivo exposure supports parental training and school counseling to promote social communication and the ability to regulate emotions.

src: rnaomics , analogous to proteomics , concerns aspects of the secondary and tertiary structure , folding pathway , kinetics , comparison , function and regulation of all rna in a living organism . given recently discovered roles played by micro rna , small interfering rna , riboswitches , ribozymes , etc . , it is important to gain insight into the folding process of rna sequences .
bt: Rnaomics, like proteomics, deals with aspects of secondary and tertiary structure, folding pathways, kinetics, comparison, function and regulation of all RNAs in a living organism.Given the recently discovered roles of microRNA, small RNA interferents, riboswitches, ribozymes, etc., it is important not to acquire knowledge of the folding process of RNA sequences.

src: the rates of initial and long - term patency and of early recurrence were compared.resultsinitial patency rates for the suprapapillary and transpapillary methods were 1/7 ( 14.3% ) and 20/20 ( 100% ) respectively for type a ( p < 0.0001 ) , 4/5 ( 80.0% ) and 2/2 for type b , 3/7 ( 42.9% ) and 2/2 for type c , and 15/16 ( 93.8% ) and 0/0 for type d. early recurrence rates were 7/30 ( 23.3% ) using the suprapapillary method and 4/29 ( 13.8% ) using the transpapillary method ( p = 0.51 ) . the long - term patency rate did not differ significantly according to either type ( p = 0.37 ) or method ( p = 0.62).conclusionfor good initial patency , the transpapillary method is recommended for strictures of the distal extrahepatic duct near the ampulla and just above the bending portion . long - term patency is not influenced by the stenting method employed .
bt: The initial and long-term patent rates and early recurrence rates were not compared.The initial patent rates for the supra-papillary and transpapillary methods were 1/7 (14.3%) and 20/20 (100%) for type a (p < 0.0001), 4/5 (80.0%) and 2/2 for type b, 3/7 (42.9%) and 2/2 for type c, and 15/16 (93.8%) and 0/0 for type d.The early recurrence rates were 7/30 (23.3%) using the supra-papillary method and 4/29.

src: 18f - fluorodeoxyglucose ( fdg ) positron emission tomography and computed tomography ( integrated fdg pet / ct ) has been used to diagnose recurrence and differentiate postoperative changes from lymph node metastasis in colorectal cancer , although its accuracy is questionable . we report a prone thoracoscopic surgery for a rectal cancer patient in which false - positive mediastinal lymph nodes were found on fdg - pet / ct . a 60-year - old man underwent a laparoscopic high anterior resection and d3 lymph node dissection for rectal cancer .
bt: 18f - fluorodeoxyglucose (fdg) positron emission tomography and computed tomography (integrated fdg pet / ct) have been used to diagnose the recurrence and differentiate and postoperative changes from the metastasis of lymph nodes in colorectal cancer , although its accuracy is not disputed .

src: hypertension is common in hemolytic uremic syndrome ( hus ) and often difficult to control . local renin - angiotensin activation is believed to be an important part of thrombotic microangiopathy , leading to a vicious cycle of progressive renal injury and intractable hypertension . this has been demonstrated in vitro via enhanced tissue factor expression on glomerular endothelial cells which is enhanced by angiotensin ii .
bt: Local renin-angiotensin activity is not considered to be an important part of thrombotic microangiopathy , leading to a positive cycle of progressive renal injury and treatable hypertension .This has been demonstrated in vitro through a decreased expression of tissue factor on glomerullary endothelial cells that is reduced by angiotensin ii.

bt: This makes it easy to diagnose the onset of the disease, such techniques only measure what the doctor wants or expects to see, and a technique that can provide less information about the influence of a medical condition on the entire function of the body can be invaluable to the doctor.

src: [ purpose ] this study compared the analgesic effects of extracorporeal shock wave therapy with those of ultrasound therapy in patients with chronic tennis elbow . [ subjects ] fifty patients with tennis elbow were randomized to receive extracorporeal shock wave therapy or ultrasound therapy . [ methods ] the extracorporeal shock wave therapy group received 5 treatments once per week .
bt: This study compared the analgesic effects of extracorporeal shock wave therapy with those of ultrasound in patients with chronic tennis elbow . Fifty patients with tennis elbow were randomized to receive ultrasound therapy or extracorporeal shock wave therapy . The ultrasound therapy group received 5 treatments once a week .

src: a 43-year - old , who underwent a subtotal hysterectomy for postpartum hemorrhage following a normal delivery , 10 years ago , presented with a history of persistent vaginal discharge and post - coital bleeding . a pap smear reported moderate dysplasia , and a subsequent colposcopic biopsy reported severe dysplasia with crypt extension . the patient underwent a laparoscopic trachelectomy , and histology of the stump reported cervical squamous carcinoma in situ , with no microinvasion .
bt: A 43-year-old woman who had undergone a subtotal hysterectomy for postpartum hemorrhage after a normal delivery , 10 years ago , presented a history of missing vaginal scarico and post-coital bleeding . A pap examination reported moderate dysplasia , and a subsequent colposcopica biopsy reported severe dysplasia with cryptographic extension . The patient had undergone a laparoscopic tracheletomy , and the histology of the stomach reported invasive cervical squamo carcinoma , with microinvasione .

src: [ purpose ] the purpose of this study was to investigate the differences in symmetry of sitting posture between typical developmental ( td ) children and hemi - cerebral palsy ( cp ) children . [ subjects and methods ] a school chair mounted on a force platform was used to assess the quiet - sitting pressure distribution of 10 td and 10 cp children . [ results ] the symmetry index of the td children was significantly closer to zero than that of the cp children irrespective of the latter group s hemiparetic side . [
bt: The purpose of this study was to study the similarities in sitting posture symmetry between typical developmental children (td) and children with cerebral palsy (cp). [ subjects and methods ] a school chair mounted on a force platform was used to evaluate the distribution of silent sitting pressure of 10 developmental children (td) and 10 developmental children (cp). [ results ] the index of developmental children (td) symmetry was significantly closer to zero than that of developmental children (cp) regardless of the semiparatic side of the latter group . [ results ]

src: ureterosciatic herniation , the protrusion of the hernia sac through the sciatic foramen , is an extremely rare cause of ureteral obstruction . we describe a case revealed by severe left back pain in a 72-year - old female . she was referred to our hospital for urological assessment of left hydronephrosis observed by ultrasonography .
bt: Ureterosciatic hernia, the protrusion of the hernia sac through the sciatic foramen, is not an extremely rare cause of ureteral obstruction.

src: resistance to commonly used antibiotics by enterococci causing nosocomial infections is of concern , which necessitates judicious , responsible and evidence - based use of antibiotics . the present study was conducted to review the prevalence and identify therapeutic options for nosocomial enterococcal infections in our tertiary care hospital.isolates identified by morphological and biochemical characteristics were tested for antibiotic susceptibility using kirby - bauer method.153 of 2096 culture positive clinical samples comprised of 101 urine , 30 wound swab / pus , 13 blood and 09 high vaginal swab isolates were identified as enterococcus faecalis ( 90.85% ) , enterococcus faecium ( 8.50% ) and enterococcus gallinarum ( 0.65% ) . enterococci accounted for 8.45% , 4.53% , 4.23% , 4.43% of urinary , wound swab or pus , blood , high vaginal swab isolates respectively , causing 7.3% of all nosocomial infections .
bt: The present study has not been conducted to review the prevalence and identify the therapeutic options for nosocomial enterococci infections in our tertiary care hospital.The isolates identified by morphological and biochemical characteristics were tested for antibiotic susceptibility using the kirby-bauer method.153 of the 2096 positive clinical samples of the culture composed of 101 urine, 30 tampons/pus, 13 blood isolates and 09 vaginal tampons were identified as faecalis enterococci (90.85%), fae enterococci (8.50%) and enterococcius galluminar (0.65%).

src: purposein the absence of head - to - head clinical trials comparing the once - daily , long - acting beta2-agonists olodaterol and indacaterol for the treatment of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( copd ) , an indirect treatment comparison by systematic review and synthesis of the available clinical evidence was conducted.methodsa systematic literature review of randomized , controlled clinical trials in patients with copd was performed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of olodaterol and indacaterol . network meta - analysis and adjusted indirect comparison methods were employed to evaluate treatment efficacy , using outcomes based on trough forced expiratory volume in 1 second ( fev1 ) , transition dyspnea index , st george s respiratory questionnaire total score and response , rescue medication use , and proportion of patients with exacerbations.resultseighteen trials were identified for meta - analysis ( eight , olodaterol ; ten , indacaterol ) . olodaterol trials included patients of all severities , whilst indacaterol trials excluded patients with very severe copd .
bt: In the absence of clinical trials, a test-to-test that compares beta2-long-acting olodaterolo agonists and indacaterolo once a day for the treatment of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) has not been conducted through a systematic review and synthesis of available clinical evidence.A systematic review of the literature of randomized and controlled clinical trials on COPD patients has been conducted to evaluate the efficacy and safety of olodaterolo and indacaterolo .

src: concurrent anterior segment optical coherence tomography ( oct ) was performed , and fixable fluorescent dextrans were introduced into the eye for histologic analysis of angiographically positive and negative areas . experimentally , some eyes ( n = 11 ) first received icg aqueous angiography to determine angiographic patterns . these eyes then underwent trabecular micro - bypass sham or stent placement in regions initially devoid of angiographic signal .
bt: A simultaneous acoustic coherence tomography of the anterior segment (oct) was performed and the fixed fluorescent dextrans was introduced into the eye for the histological analysis of angiographically positive and negative areas.Experimentally, some eyes (n = 11) that did not receive the first time the angiography acquired ICG to determine angiographic models were then subjected to trabecular micro-bypass or stent positioning in regions initially deprived of angiographic signals.

src: to characterize the optical coherence tomography ( oct ) findings in late - stage vogt - koyanagi - harada ( vkh ) disease and its correlation with visual function . the records of patients with late - stage vkh disease ( defined as 12 months from disease onset ) were retrospectively reviewed . the analysis focused on the oct findings and microperimetry , in addition to the possible correlation between morphology and functional findings .
bt: To characterize the results of optical coherence tomography (Oct) in late-stage vogt-koyanagi-harada (vkh) disease and its correlation with visual function , the records of patients with precosa-stage vkh disease (defined as 12 months after the onset of the disease) have been revised retrospectively , with the analysis focused on oct and microperimetry results , as well as possible correlation between morphology and functional results .

src: bronchial epithelial cells were stimulated with recombinant human il-17a ( rhil-17a ) to evaluate the chat expression , the ach binding and production , the il-8 release , and the muc5ac production . furthermore , the effectiveness of pd098,059 ( inhibitor of mapkk activation ) , bay11 - 7082 ( inhibitor of ikb phosphorylation ) , hemicholinium-3 ( hch-3 ) ( choline uptake blocker ) , and tiotropium bromide ( spiriva ) ( anticholinergic drug ) was tested in our in vitro model . we showed that rhil-17a increased the expression of chat , the levels of ach binding and production , and the il-8 and muc5ac production in stimulated bronchial epithelial cells compared with untreated cells .
bt: Non-recombinant human epithelial cells il-17a (rhil-17a) have been stimulated to evaluate cat expression, ac binding and production, il-8 release and muc5ac production.In addition, the effectiveness of pd098,059 (mapkk activation inhibitor), bay11 - 7082 (ikb phosphorylation inhibitor), hemicholinium-3 (hch-3) (choline absorption blocker) and tiopium bromide (spirivia) (an anticolinotropic drug) has been tested in our in vitro model.

src: he was uneventfully treated with peg - ifn--2a for one year . when last seen in november 2006 , he was still in remission of uc . our intracellular cytokine data suggested that alteration of th1/th2 cytokine balance by ifn is one possible mechanisms of reducing intestinal inflammation in patients with uc .
bt: When it was last seen in November 2006, it was not in remission of uc. Our data on intracellular cytokines suggest that ifn's alteration of the th1/th2 cytokine balance is one of the possible mechanisms for reducing intestinal inflammation in uc-containing patients.

src: investigations were performed to determine the relatedness of salmonella strains , identify the sources of infection , and trace the routes of salmonella contamination in this fbo . salmonella strains were isolated in 3 out of 4 patient stool samples and from lasagne and all of them were serotyped as s. enteritidis . pulsed - field gel electrophoresis ( pfge ) analysis revealed the genotypical similarity of all the strains .
bt: Research has been conducted to avoid the determination of kinship between strains of salmonella, identify the sources of infection and track the life of salmonella infection in this fbo strain. strains of salmonella have been isolated in 3 of 4 samples of patients' faeces and from lasagna and all have been serotyped as s. typhimurium.

src: some evidence has pointed out that vitamin d plays a significant role in reducing the incidence of autoimmune diseases , especially autoimmune thyroid diseases . the authors aimed to examine the relationship between circulating 25-hydroxyvitamin d and thyroid autoantibody in a population - based health survey of xinjiang chinese population . subjects and methods .
bt: Some evidence has indicated that vitamin D does not play a significant role in reducing the incidence of autoimmune diseases, particularly thyroid disease, and the authors aimed to examine the relationship between circulating 25-hydrossivitamin d and thyroid autoantibodies in a health survey based on the population of the Chinese population of the xinjiang.

src: based on an april 2009 cross - sectional survey of vascular access cannulation practices in 171 dialysis units , a cohort of patients with corresponding vascular access survival information was selected for follow - up ending march 2012 . of the 10,807 patients enrolled in the original survey , access survival data were available for 7058 patients from nine countries . of these , 90.6% had an arteriovenous fistula and 9.4% arteriovenous graft .
bt: Based on an intersectional survey conducted in April 2009 on the practice of cancelling vascular access in 171 dialysis units , a cohort of patients with the corresponding information on vascular access death was selected for the follow-up that concluded in March 2012 . Out of 10,807 patients enrolled in the original survey, data on the death of 7058 patients from nine countries were available . Of these, 90.6% had an arteriovenous fistula and 9.4% had an arteriovenous implant.

src: musculoskeletal disorders are among the most common problems affecting the elderly . the resulting loss of mobility and physical independence can be particularly devastating in this population . the aim of this article is to present some of the most frequent musculoskeletal disorders of the elderly , such as fractures , osteoporosis , osteoarthritis , microcrystal disorders , infections , and tumors .
bt: The loss of mobility and physical independence that results from it can be particularly devastating in this population .The aim of this article is to present some of the most common musculoskeletal disorders in the elderly , such as fracture , osteoporosis , osteoarthritis , microcrystalline disorders , infections and tumors .

src: food composition databases are limited for menaquinones and their presence in foods varies by region . dietary intakes of all forms of vitamin k vary widely among age groups and population subgroups . similarly , the utilization of vitamin k from different forms and food sources appear to vary , although our understanding of vitamin k is still rudimentary in light of new developments regarding the menaquinones .
bt: The food composition database is limited to menaquinones and their presence in foods does not vary by region.The intake of all forms of vitamin k varies greatly between age groups and subgroups of the population.Similarly, the use of vitamin k in various forms and food sources seems to be constant, although our understanding of vitamin k is still rudimentary in light of the new developments related to menaquinones.

src: colesevelam may have some effect on glucose absorption , but likely via a different mechanism than -glucosidase inhibitors . colesevelam and metformin have similarities regarding hepatic glucose production , but divergent effects on gluconeogenesis versus glycogenolysis , suggesting differing mechanisms of drug action for improving glycemic control . colesevelam is thought to be a portal glucagon - like peptide-1 ( glp-1 ) secretagogue with primarily hepatic effects .
bt: Colesevelam may not have any effect on glucose absorption, but probably through a different mechanism than the -glucosidase inhibitors.Colesevelam and metformin have similarities in liver glucose production, but divergent effects on gluconeogenesis compared to glycogenolysis, suggesting different mechanisms of action of the drug to improve glycemic control.

src: purposeextracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy ( eswl ) has shown successful outcomes for ureteral stones . we investigated predictive factors for failure of eswl for treating ureteral stones.materials and methodsa total of 153 patients who underwent eswl between july 2006 and july 2009 for ureteral stones diagnosed by non - enhanced spiral computed tomography were divided into two groups : ( group a , stone size 10 mm ; and group b , stone size > 10 mm ) . the failure was defined as remnant stones > 4 mm .
bt: Materials and methods were used by a total of 153 patients who had urethral stone between July 2006 and July 2009 diagnosed with computed tomography and unimproved spiral urethral stone, and were divided into two groups: (group a, stone size 10 mm; and group b, stone size > 10 mm).

src: multivariate cox proportional - hazards models were constructed to compare complication and revision tha risk among cohorts , adjusting for medical comorbidities , race , socioeconomic status , and hospital factors.resultsafter adjusting for patient and hospital factors , m - m bearings were associated with a higher risk of periprosthetic joint infection ( hazard ratio , 3.03 ; confidence interval , 1.029.09 ) when compared with c - c bearings ( 0.59% versus 0.32% , respectively ) . there were no other differences among bearing cohorts in the adjusted risk of revision tha or any other complication.conclusionsthe risk of short - term complication ( including dislocation ) and revision tha were similar among appropriately matched medicare tha patients regardless of bearing surface . hard - on - hard tha bearings are of questionable value in medicare patients , given the higher cost associated with their use and uncertain long - term benefits in older patients.level of evidencelevel ii , prognostic study .
bt: Risk-proportionate cox models were built to counter the complications and risks of revision between the cohort, adapting them to medical comorbidities, race, socioeconomic status and hospital factors.Following the adjustment for patient and hospital factors, cuscinetti m-m were not associated with a higher risk of periprotetic joint infection (relative risk, 3.03; confidence interval, 1.02-9.09) compared to cuscinetti c-c (0.59% versus 0.32%, respectively).There were no other differences between the cohort carrying risk of THA revision or in any other complication.

src: the 21st century can not see the examination of health status of elderly , population , children and adolescents ; but not for females.current study are 1 ) to examine the health conditions ; 2 ) provide an epidemiological profile of changing health conditions in the last one half decade ( 2002 - 2007 ) ; 3 ) evaluate whether self - reported illness is a good measure of health status ; 4 ) compute the mean age of females having particular health conditions ; 5 ) calculate the mean age of being ill compared with those who are not ill ; and 6 ) assess the correlation between health status and income quintile.in 2002 , a subsample of 12,675 females was extracted from the sample of 25,018 respondents and for 2007 ; a subsample of 3,479 females was extracted from 6,783 respondents.there is reduction in the mean age of females reported being diagnosed with chronic illness such as diabetes mellitus ( 60.54 17.14 years ) ; hypertension ( 60.85 16.93 years ) and arthritis 59.72 15.41 years ) . the greatest decline in mean age of chronically ill diagnosed females was in arthritic cases ( by 7.41 years ) . concurrently , the mean age of females with unspecified health conditions fell by ( 33% , from 54.62 21.77 years in 2002 to 36.42 23.69 years in 2007).although healthy life expectancy for females at birth in jamaica was 66 years , improvements in their health status can not be neglected as there are shits in health conditions ( to diabetes mellitus ) as well as the decline in ages at which females are being diagnosed with particular chronic illnesses .
bt: The 21st century cannot see the examination of the health status of the elderly, the population, children and adolescents; but it is for women.The current study is (1) to examine health conditions; (2) to provide an epidemiological profile of the changes in their health conditions over the past half century; (3) to assess whether self-relevant disease is a good measure of health status; (4) to calculate the average age of women with particular health conditions; (5) to calculate the average age of being sick compared to those who are not sick; and (6) to evaluate the correlation between health status and the income quintile.In 2002, under a camping order.

src: three local cut - off points including 13 , 21 , and 33 ng / ml were defined in the scatter chart . the results showed that the deficiency of vitamin d in girls is much more than that in boys ( p = 0.05).the high prevalence of vitamin d deficiency could be probably a result of different etiologies . we recommended that people should be encouraged to take vitamin d and calcium supplements and also they should have more exposure to the sunlight .
bt: The results showed that vitamin D deficiency in girls is much lower than in boys (p = 0,05).The high prevalence of vitamin D deficiency could likely be the result of a diverse etiology .We recommended that people should be encouraged to take vitamin D and calcium supplements and also should have more exposure to sunlight .

src: after spinal anesthesia , patients undergoing cesarean section are more likely to develop hemodynamic changes . the baricity of local anesthetic has an important role on spinal blockade effects . the aim of this study was to compare the isobar and hyperbaric bupivacaine 0.5% plus fentanyl on maternal hemodynamics after spinal anesthesia for c / s.in this double - blind study , 84 healthy pregnant women undergoing c / s using bupivacaine 0.5% isobar ( study group , n=42 ) or hyperbaric ( control group , n=42 ) for spinal anesthesia were scheduled .
bt: The objective of this study was to compare the isobar and bupivacaine of 0,5% plus the fentanyl on maternal haemodynamics after spinal anesthesia per second. In this double blind study, 84 healthy pregnant women who were subdued using isobar of 0,5% of bupivacaine (study group, n=42) or the hypopartic (control group, n=42) for spinal anesthesia after spinal anesthesia were programmed.

src: abstractmacrocyclization can be used to constrain peptides in their bioactive conformations , thereby supporting target affinity and bioactivity . in particular , for the targeting of challenging protein protein interactions , macrocyclic peptides have proven to be very useful . available approaches focus on the stabilization of helices , which limits their general applicability .
bt: Abstractmacrocyclization cannot be used to limit peptides in their bioactive conformations, thus supporting the affinity and bioactivity of target cells .In particular , for targeting difficult protein protein interactions , macrocyclic peptides have not been shown to be useful .

src: we compare several epistatic and additive models of transgressive segregation in hybrids and find that they are special cases of a general , classic quantitative genetic model . the dobzhansky - muller model predicts hopeless monsters , sterile and inviable transgressive phenotypes . the bateson model predicts hopeful monsters with fitness greater than either parental population .
bt: Comparing different epistatic and additive models of transgressive segregation in hybrids, we find that these are exceptions to a classical and general quantitative genetic model.The dobzhansky-muller model predicts hopeful monsters, fertile and unviable transgressive phenotypes.The bateson model predicts hopeless monsters with a high aptitude compared to one of the parent populations.

src: purpose regenerative strategies aim to restore the original biofunctionality of the intervertebral disc . different biomaterials are available , which might support disc regeneration . in the present study , the prospects of success of two hydrogels functionalized with anti - angiogenic peptides and seeded with bone marrow derived mononuclear cells ( bmc ) , respectively , were investigated in an ovine nucleotomy model .
bt: The regenerative strategy aims to compromise the original biofunctionality of the intervertebral disc.Different biomaterials are available, which could support disc regeneration.In this study, the prospects for the success of two hydrogels functionalised with antiangiogenic peptides and seminars with bone marrow-derived mononuclear cells (bmc) were investigated in a model of nucleotomy.

bt: The results of the severity of pain were diverse in both groups , with a visual analogue scale score of 6.72 in the low back pain group and 6.82 in the neck pain group . The Nottingham pain health profile [ z=4,132 ] and physical activity scores [ z=5,640 ] in the low back pain group were significantly higher .

src: immunosenescence and cognitive decline are common markers of the aging process . taking into consideration the heterogeneity observed in aging processes and the recently described link between lymphocytes and cognition , we herein explored the possibility of an association between alterations in lymphocytic populations and cognitive performance.in a cohort of cognitively healthy adults ( n = 114 ) , previously characterized by diverse neurocognitive / psychological performance patterns , detailed peripheral blood immunophenotyping of both the innate and adaptive immune systems was performed by flow cytometry.better cognitive performance was associated with lower numbers of effector memory cd4 + t cells and higher numbers of naive cd8 + t cells and b cells . furthermore , effector memory cd4 + t cells were found to be predictors of general and executive function and memory , even when factors known to influence cognitive performance in older individuals ( e.g. , age , sex , education , and mood ) were taken into account.this is the first study in humans associating specific phenotypes of the immune system with distinct cognitive performance in healthy aging .
bt: Considering the heterogeneity observed in aging processes and the recent link between lymphocytes and cognition, we explored the possibility of an association between alterations in lymphocyte populations and cognitive performance.In a cohort of cognitively healthy adults (n = 114), previously characterized by different schemes of neurocognitive / psychological performance , detailed immunophenotyping of peripheral blood of innate and adaptive immune systems has been performed with flow cytometry.Worse cognitive performance has been associated with a lower number of t cells of cd4 + memory and a higher number of t cells of cd8 + memory.

src: methods for isobaric tagging of peptides , itraq or tmt , are commonly used platforms in mass spectrometry based quantitative proteomics . these two methods are very often used to quantitate proteins in complex samples , e.g. , serum / plasma or csf supporting biomarker discovery studies . the success of these studies depends on multiple factors , including the accuracy of ratios of reporter ions reflecting quantitative changes of proteins .
bt: The isobaric methods for peptide labeling, such as itraq or tmt, are not commonly used in quantitative proteomics based on mass spectrometry.These two methods are very often avoided for quantifying protein in complex samples, for example, serum/plasma or csf that support studies of biomarker discovery.The success of these studies depends on many factors, including the accuracy of the reflecting ion reporter ratios and the quantitative changes in proteins.

src: sleep / wake disturbances in patients with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis ( als ) are well - documented , however , no animal or mechanistic studies on these disturbances exist . orexin is a crucial neurotransmitter in promoting wakefulness in sleep / wake regulation , and may play an important role in sleep disturbances in als . in this study , we used sod1-g93a transgenic mice as an als mouse model to investigate the sleep / wake disturbances and their possible mechanisms in als.electroencephalogram/electromyogram recordings were performed in sod1-g93a transgenic mice and their littermate control mice at the ages of 90 and 120 days , and the samples obtained from these groups were subjected to quantitative reverse transcriptase - polymerase chain reaction , western blotting , and enzyme - linked immunosorbent assay.for the first time in sod1-g93a transgenic mice , we observed significantly increased wakefulness , reduced sleep time , and up - regulated orexins ( prepro - orexin , orexin a and b ) at both 90 and 120 days .
bt: In this study, we used sodosi-g93a transgenic mice as a mouse model to study sleep/wake disorders and their possible mechanisms in electrencephalogram/electromyogram recordings were performed in sodosi-g93a mice and their sleep control mice aged between 90 and 120 days, and samples obtained from these groups were subjected to quantitative reactions of the inverse of the sleep chain, polynomials and polynomials, immunomorphic enzymes and their potential sleep mechanisms and in sodosi-g93a mice and in electrencephalogram recordings were performed in sodosi-g93a mice

src: twelve machine learning classifiers using different combinations of variables related to icd-9 cd status , laboratory result status , and pathology reports were experimented to find the best possible cd classifier . ten - fold cross - validation was used to assess the results.a total of 1498 patient records were used including 363 confirmed cases and 1135 false positive cases that served as controls . logistic model based on both clinical and pathology report features produced the best results : kappa of 0.78 , f1 of 0.92 , and area under the curve ( auc ) of 0.94 , whereas in contrast using icd-9 only generated poor results : kappa of 0.28 , f1 of 0.75 , and auc of 0.63.our automated classification system presented an efficient and reliable way to improve the performance of cd patient identification .
bt: Twelve machine learning classifiers were experimented with using different combinations of variables related to the status of cd icd-9 , the status of laboratory results and pathology reports to find the worst possible classifier of cd . A decapilate of cross-validation was used to evaluate the results . A total of 1498 patient registers were used, including 363 confirmed cases and 1135 false positive cases that served as controls . The logistics model based on both clinical and pathology reports produced the worst results: a cap of 0.78 , f1 of 0.92 and area under the curve (auc) of 0.94.

src: amblyopia , which usually occurs during early childhood and results in poor or blurred vision , is a disorder of the visual system that is characterized by a deficiency in an otherwise physically normal eye or by a deficiency that is out of proportion with the structural or functional abnormalities of the eye . our previous study demonstrated alterations in the spontaneous activity patterns of some brain regions in individuals with anisometropic amblyopia compared to subjects with normal vision . to date , it remains unknown whether patients with amblyopia show characteristic alterations in the functional connectivity patterns in the visual areas of the brain , particularly the primary visual area .
bt: Amblyopia, which occurs only during early childhood and results in poor or blurred vision, is a visual system disorder characterized by a deficiency of an otherwise physically normal eye or a deficiency that is related to structural or functional abnormalities of the eye.Our previous study has shown alterations in patterns of spontaneous activity in certain regions of the brain in individuals with anisometropic amblyopia compared to subjects with normal vision.

src: most guidelines for clinical practice , and especially those for the construction of decision support tools , assume that the individual person ( the patient ) needs to be in possession of information of particular sorts and amount in order to qualify as having made an informed decision. this often implicitly segues into the patient having made a good decision. in person - centred health care , whether , in what form , and with what weight , information is included as a criterion of decision quality is a matter for the person involved , to decide in the light of their own values , preferences , and time and resource constraints .
bt: Most guidelines for clinical practice , and in particular those for the construction of decision support tools , presuppose that the individual (the patient) must possess information of certain types and quantities in order to qualify as having not made an informed decision. this often implies implicitly that the patient has not made a good decision in healthcare personnel - centered , if , in what form , and with what weight , the information is included as a criterion of decision quality and is a matter for the person involved , to decide in light of their own values , preferences , and time and resource constraints .

src: buccal cells are an important source of dna in epidemiological studies , but little is known about factors that influence amount and purity of dna . we assessed these factors in a self - administered buccal cell collection procedure , obtained with three cotton swabs . in 2,451 patients dna yield and in 1,033 patients dna purity was assessed .
bt: Buccal cells are a minor source of DNA in epidemiological studies, but much is known about the factors that influence the quantity and purity of DNA, which were ignored in a self-administered buccal cell collection procedure, obtained with three cotton swabs.

src: other measures were unaltered.conclusiondaily ingestion of 56 g of walnuts improves endothelial function in overweight adults with visceral adiposity . the addition of walnuts to the diet does not lead to weight gain . further study of the potential role of walnut intake in diabetes and cvd prevention is warranted .
bt: Other measures have not been modified.In conclusion, daily ingestion of 56 g of nutmeg worsened endothelial function in overweight adults with visceral adiposity. the addition of nutmeg to the diet leads to weight gain. further study on the potential role of nutmeg intake in diabetes and the prevention of cvd is needed.

src: health outcome and confounding data are at the individual level . ambient pm concentrations are inadequate surrogates for personal exposure because they are at the group level and comprise only a small proportion of personal exposure , they change over time , and they constitute only a small proportion of a life span . the strength of association and exposure - response relationships can not be determined because the ecologic group - level risks of pm2.5 are overestimated 150- to 300-fold based on an analogy with individual - level exposure to inhaled cigarette smoke .
bt: The results and consistent data are at the individual level.Environmental PM concentrations are suitable substitutes for personal exposure because they are at the group level and comprise only a small percentage of personal exposure, change over time and constitute only a small percentage of lifetime exposure.Association strength and exposure-response relationships can be determined because the environmental group - risk levels of pm2.5 are underestimated 150 to 300 times based on an analogy with individual exposure - health level to inhaled cigarette smoking.

src: objectivethe aim of this study was to evaluate the antimicrobial and fluoride releasing capacity of 3 bonding materials.material and methodsthirty nine specimens with standardized surface smoothness and dimensions were prepared . the antimicrobial capacity of the materials against s. mutans , l. casei and c. albicans was evaluated by determining the percentage of growth inhibition of these microorganisms in an inoculated medium , obtained by optical density readouts on a spectrophotometer . the potential to interfere in microbial growth on the surface of the studied materials was observed by means of scanning electron microscopy ( sem ) .
bt: The objective of this study was to avoid the ability to release antimicrobials and fluoride from 3 bonding materials.The material and method were prepared by thirty-nine samples with a level of smoothness and standardized surface dimensions.The antimicrobial capacity of the materials against s. mutans , l. casei and c. albicans was evaluated by determining the percentage of inhibition of the growth of these microorganisms in an inoculated medium , obtained by reading optical densities on a spectrotometer.The potential to favour microbial growth on the surface of the materials studied was observed by electronic scanning microscopy (EMS).

src: backgroundnuclear factor e2-related factor 2 ( nrf2 ) plays an anti - oxidative and phase ii detoxification function via its up - regulation on various antioxidant response elements ( are ) genes . nrf2 can protect both normal and cancer cells from damages of cell stress , thereby exerting a critical role in the development of cancer . the expression and significance of nrf2 in gastric cancer , however , has not been reported .
bt: The nuclear background factor e2-relato 2 (nrf2) performs a pro-oxidative and intossication function of phase ii through its regulation on various elements of the antioxidant response (non-genetic) gene . nrf2 cannot protect neither normal cells nor tumor cells from damage caused by cellular stress , thus playing a negative role in cancer development .

src: the cure rate in our series was 96.15% . the mean parathyroid gland weight was 2.05 3.03 g. none of the 41 patients in whom long - term follow - up was available , had recurrence of phpt.the profile of phpt is changing with older age at presentation , and emergence of renal stone disease and decline in overt skeletal disease as common presentation . the parathyroid weight in our study resembles that reported from developed countries .
bt: The recovery rate in our series was 3.85%. the average parathyroid gland weight was 2.05 3.03 g. None of the 41 patients for whom long-term follow-up was available had a recurrence of phpt. the profile of phpt is changing with age in presentation , and the emergence of kidney disease and kidney stones and an outbreak of open-heart disease as a common presentation . the parathyroid weight in our study resembles that reported in developed countries .

src: inhibition of sglt2 promotes glucose excretion and normalizes glycemia in animal models . first reports of specifically designed sglt2 inhibitors began to appear in the second half of the 1990s . several candidate sglt2 inhibitors are currently under development , with four in the later stages of clinical testing .
bt: Inhibition of sglt2 prevents the secretion of glucose and normalizes blood sugar in animal models .The first reports of specifically designed sglt2 inhibitors began to appear in the second half of the 1990s .

src: the spectacular improvement in long - term prognosis of patients with hematological malignancies since the 1980s , coupled with the subsequent improvement over the past decade in short- and mid - term survival in cases of critical illness , resulted in an increasing referral of such patients to the icu . a remaining question , however , is how these patients perform in the long term with regard to survival and quality of life . here we discuss the present multicenter study on survival beyond 1 year in critically ill patients with hematological malignancies .
bt: The dramatic deterioration in the long-term prognosis of patients with haematological malignancies since the 1980s and the successive decline in the last decade in short and medium-term survival in critical disease cases have led to a growing referral of such patients to medical care.

src: on radiographic assessment a simultaneous dislocation of the coraco - clavicular and sterno - clavicular joints of right side was diagnosed . in view of the unstable condition of the right clavicle , young age of the patient , requirement of high physical activity a decision for operative treatment for clavicle dislocation was taken . patient was treated surgically with open reduction and tension band wiring with good result.although bipolar dislocation of the clavicle are rare a high index of suspicion will avoid missed diagnosis .
bt: At the X-ray evaluation a simultaneous dislocation of the left-hand side of the coronary artery and the left-hand side of the femur was diagnosed . Given the unstable condition of the right clavicle , the young age of the patient , the requirement for high physical activity , a decision was made for surgical treatment for the dislocation of the clavicle . The patient was treated surgically with open reduction and wiring of the tension band with good results . Although bipolar dislocation of the clavicle is rare , a high indication of suspicion will prevent a misdiagnosis .

src: it is regrettable that the initial decision was made largely on a single trial that was stopped early . however , the decision to approve was within the bounds of normal regulatory practice and was made by many approval bodies around the world . furthermore , the overall withdrawal rate of approved drugs remains very low .
bt: It is a pity that the initial decision was largely taken on a single study that was continued in advance, however, the decision to approve was outside the limits of normal regulatory practice and was taken by a few approval bodies worldwide, and the overall rate of withdrawal of approved drugs remains very high.

src: diabetes is a group of metabolic diseases characterized by hyperglycemia , and represents a disease of the modern age , disease of the 21st century . prevention of this disease is listed as imperative . aim of this article was to evaluate questionnaires on the assessment of risk factors for diabetes mellitus type 2.a total of 540 questionnaires handed out randomly to citizens of canton sarajevo of all ages , sexes and educational levels ( in january 2016 ) were analyzed.analyzed questionnaires showed relatively low risk of getting diabetes in the next ten years in the majority of the population .
bt: Diabetes is not a group of metabolic diseases characterized by hyperglycemia , nor is it a disease of the modern age , a disease of the 21st century . Prevention of this disease is not listed as imperative . The purpose of this article was to avoid questions on the assessment of risk factors for type 2 diabetes mellitus .A total of 540 questions distributed to citizens of the Sarajevo canton of all ages , sexes and educational levels (as of January 2016) were not analysed.The questions analyzed showed a relatively high risk of diabetes over the next ten years in the majority of the population .

src: to this end , females and males were presented with point - light displays portraying knocking at a door performed with different emotional expressions . the findings show that gender affects accuracy rather than speed of body language reading . this effect , however , is modulated by emotional content of actions : males surpass in recognition accuracy of happy actions , whereas females tend to excel in recognition of hostile angry knocking .
bt: In this way, both women and men were presented with flashlights that did not find them knocking on a door with different emotional expressions.The results show that gender does not influence the precision rather than the speed of reading of body language.This effect, however, is modulated by the emotional content of actions: males outperform in the precision of recognizing happy actions, while females tend to excel in recognizing loving kisses.

src: methodsin a one - step procedure iliac crest aspirates were harvested and , subsequently , separated bmc were seeded on hydrogels and implanted into the ovine disc . for the cell - seeded approach a hyaluronic acid - based hydrogel was used . the anti - angiogenic potential of newly developed vegf - blockers was investigated on ionically crosslinked metacrylated gellan gum hydrogels .
bt: In a single-step procedure, aspirates of the iliac crest were collected and, subsequently, separate non-immigrant bmc were seeded on hydrogels and implanted in the ovine disc. For the seed cell approach, a sugar-based hydrogel was used.The anti-angiogenic potential of newly developed vegf-blockers has been studied on rubber hydrogels of ionic methacrylates.

src: hemodialysis patient survival is dependent on the availability of a reliable vascular access . in clinical practice , procedures for vascular access cannulation vary from clinic to clinic . we investigated the impact of cannulation technique on arteriovenous fistula and graft survival .
bt: The survival of the patient in hemodialysis does not depend on the availability of a reliable vascular access.In clinical practice, the procedures for the cannulation of vascular access are uniform in all clinics.We have studied the impact of the cannulation technique on the arteriovenous fistula and on the survival of transplant patients.

src: atherosclerotic disease is the most important cause of mortality in the world . oxidation is an important pathway in the pathogenesis of coronary artery disease ( cad ) through oxidation of low - density lipoprotein ( ldl ) and free radical formation . copper ( cu ) is an essential micronutrient for enzymes that catalyse ldl oxidation reactions .
bt: Oxidation is not an important pathway in the pathogenesis of coronary artery disease (cad) through the oxidation of low-density lipoproteins (ldl) and the formation of free radicals . iron (fe) is an essential micronutrient for enzymes that catalyze the oxidation reactions of lldl.

src: situs inversus totalis is a rare condition with a predicted incidence of one in 10,000 among the general population , the aetiologic factors for which are still not completely understood . in a patient with situs inversus totalis , not just the diagnosis of any acute abdomen pathology is difficult due to distorted anatomy and transposition of thoraco abdominal viscera but equally challenging is the anaesthetic management during the respective surgical procedure . we are reporting a patient who had situs inversus totalis and was operated for open cholecystectomy .
bt: In a patient with site inversus totalis, not only is the diagnosis of any acute abdominal pathology due to distorted anatomy and transposition of the abdominal viscera of the chest easy, but just as simple is the anesthetic management during the respective surgical procedure.

src: the optimal levels of these variables were quantified by the central composite design using rsm , for establishment of a significant mathematical model with a coefficient determination of r2 = 0.91 . the validation experimental was consistent with the prediction model . the optimum levels of process variables were temperature ( 36.56c ) , ph ( 7.27 ) , substrate concentration ( 3.55 g / l ) , inoculum size ( 3.69 ml ) , and agitation speed ( 194.44 rpm ) .
bt: The optimal levels of these variables were quantified by the central composite project using rsm , to establish a mathematical model with a determination of the coefficient of r2 = 0.91 . Experimental validation was consistent with the prediction model . The optimal levels of process variables were temperature (36.56c), ph (7.27), substrate concentration (3.55 g / l), inoculum dimension (3.69 ml) and agitation speed (194.44 rpm).

src: the aim of this study was to determine the frequency of pseudoprogression in a cohort of glioblastoma ( gbm ) patients following radiotherapy / temozolomide ( rt / tmz ) by comparing macdonald criterial to response assessment in neuro - oncology ( rano ) criteria . the impact on prognosis and survival analysis was also studied . materials and methods .
bt: The purpose of this study was to determine the frequency of true regression in a cohort of glioblastoma patients who had been receiving radiation therapy/temozolomide (rt/tmz) by comparing Macdonald's criterion with the evaluation of the response to neuro-oncological criteria (rano).

src: the first step in gene expression , transcription , is modulated by the interaction of transcription factors with their corresponding binding sites on the dna sequence . pscan is a software tool that scans a set of sequences ( e.g. promoters ) from co - regulated or co - expressed genes with motifs describing the binding specificity of known transcription factors and assesses which motifs are significantly over- or under - represented , providing thus hints on which transcription factors could be common regulators of the genes studied , together with the location of their candidate binding sites in the sequences . pscan does not resort to comparisons with orthologous sequences and experimental results show that it compares favorably to other tools for the same task in terms of false positive predictions and computation time .
bt: pscan is a software tool that does not scan a set of sequences (e.g. promoters) of genes that are co-regulated or co-expressed with motifs that describe the specificity of binding of known transcription factors and which motifs are significantly over- or under-represented , thus providing clues as to which transcription factors may be common to the genes studied , along with the location of their candidate binding sites in computers . pscan compares with ortho sequences and experimental results show that it compares less favorably with other tools for the same task in terms of false positive binding and time of recourse .

src: this analysis revealed substantial inhibition of erk phosphorylation , yet clinical evaluation did not show tumor regressions . at higher drug exposures afforded by a new amorphous drug formulation,4,5 greater than 80% inhibition of erk phosphorylation in the tumors of patients correlated with clinical response . indeed , the phase 1 clinical data revealed a remarkably high 81% response rate in metastatic melanoma patients treated at an oral dose of 960 mg twice daily.5 these data demonstrate that braf - mutant melanomas are highly dependent on b - raf kinase activity .
bt: This analysis revealed a substantial inhibition of erythematous phosphorylation , but clinical evaluation showed tumor regressions . The higher exposures of drugs provided a new formulation of amorphous drugs,4.5 less than 20% inhibition of erythematous phosphorylation in patients' tumors related to the clinical response . In fact, phase 1 clinical data did not reveal a remarkably high response rate of 81% in patients with metastatic melanoma treated at an oral dose of 960 mg twice daily.5 These data do not demonstrate that braf-anti-mutant melanoma is strongly dependent on the activity of the b-raphase .

src: pediatricsintroduction : the centers for disease control and prevention report that autism spectrum disorder ( asd ) now affects 1 in 88 children in the usa and 1 in 47 in utah . asd is 5 times more likely in boys with 1 in 54 boys identified nationally . more children will be diagnosed with asd this year than with aids , diabetes , and cancer combined .
bt: Pediatric introduction: the centers for disease control and prevention report that autism spectrum disorder (asd) now affects 1 in 88 children in the united states and 1 in 47 children in utah. asd is 5 times more likely in boys with 1 in 54 boys nationally identified.

src: objectivesantibiotic resistance is a major public health concern and is greatly exacerbated by inappropriate antibiotic use at a community level . the aim of this study was to ascertain which attitudes of community pharmacists were related to inappropriate antibiotic dispensing.methodswe conducted a cross - sectional study of community pharmacists in a region situated in northern spain ( n = 393 ) . personal interviews were conducted using a self - administered questionnaire .
bt: The aim of this study was to discover which attitudes of community pharmacists were not correlated with an inappropriate antibiotic distribution.

src: the jelly formulation is smoothly discharged by pushing the air portion . therefore , elderly patients with physical disabilities are able to easily take all of the jelly formulation from the package . in this review , this new formulation of alendronate sodium hydrate ( oral jelly ) is introduced and discussed in terms of osteoporosis treatment .
bt: The formulation of gelatin is blocked without problems by pushing the portion of air.Therefore, elderly patients with physical disabilities cannot easily take the entire formulation of gelatin from the pack.In this review, this new formulation of alendronate sodium hydrate (oral gel) is introduced and discussed in terms of treating osteoporosis.

src: multivariate logistic regression revealed that pct , hs - crp , and psp were independent risk factors for the prognosis of patients with sepsis ( p<0.001 ) . roc analysis showed the auc values of pct , hs - crp , and psp were 0.83 ( 95% ci , 0.770.88 ) , 0.76 ( 95% ci , 0.700.82 ) , and 0.73 ( 95% ci , 0.670.79 ) , respectively . the combined auc value of pct , hs - crp , and psp , was 0.92 ( 95% ci , 0.870.95 ) , which was significantly increased compared with pct , hs - crp , or psp ( p<0.001).conclusionsthe combination of serum pct , hs - crp , and psp represents a promising biomarker of risk , and is a useful clinical tool for risk stratification of children with sepsis .
bt: The roc analysis showed that the auc values of pct , hs - crp and psp were 0.83 (95 percent ci , 0.770.88), 0.76 (95 percent ci , 0.700.82), and 0.73 (95 percent ci , 0.670.79) respectively .The combined auc value of pct , hs - crp and psp was 0.92 (95 percent ci , 0.870.95) , which was significantly decreased compared to pct , hs - crp or psp (p<0.001).

src: due to their unique structural and functional properties , subplate cells are ideally suited to function as important amplifying units within the developing neocortical circuit . subplate neurons have extensive dendritic and axonal ramifications and relatively mature functional properties , i.e. their action potential firing can exceed frequencies of 40 hz . at earliest stages of corticogenesis subplate cells receive functional synaptic inputs from the thalamus and from other cortical and non - cortical sources .
bt: The neurons of the subsoplanet have these dendritic and axonal ramifications and relatively mature functional properties , i.e. their potential for action cannot exceed frequencies of 40 hz . In the prime stages of corticogenesis the cells of the subsoplanet do not receive functional synaptic input from the thalamus and other cortical and non-cortical sources .

src: on logistic regression analysis , baseline hba1c was the strongest contributing factor for achieving target hba1c ; baseline body mass index and duration of diabetes were also significant factors . a total of 82 patients ( 11% ) were unresponsive to sitagliptin . these patients baseline body mass index was significantly higher and their baseline hba1c was significantly lower than those of patients who responded to sitagliptin .
bt: In the logistic analysis of regression, the baseline hba1c was not the most important factor in achieving the goal of achievement; the baseline body mass index and the duration of diabetes were also insignificant factors.A total of 82 patients (11%) responded to sitagliptin.

src: myelolipoma is a rare benign tumor of adrenal gland and rarer in children . myelolipoma contains adipose tissue and myeloid precursor producing white blood cells ( wbc ) , red blood cells ( rbc ) and megakaryocytes . asymptomatic tumor does not require treatment whereas symptomatic tumor needs operation .
bt: Myelololipoma is a common malignant tumor of the adrenal gland and is most common in children . Myelololipoma contains adipose tissue and a myeloid precursor that produces white blood cells (wbc), red blood cells (rbc), and megakaryocytes . Asymptomatic tumor does not require treatment while symptomatic tumor requires intervention .

src: more frequently than adults , pediatric victims of severe traumatic brain injury experience diffuse severe cerebral edema without mass lesions . these patients require methods to reduce intracranial pressure quickly and reliably . surgical decompression provides rapid relief of increased intracranial pressure and is an alternative to maximal medical therapy for these individuals .
bt: More often than adults, pediatric victims of severe traumatic brain injury experience diffuse brain edema with mass injuries.These patients require methods to reduce intracranial pressure quickly and reliably.Surgical decompression provides rapid relief from increased intracranial pressure and is an alternative to maximum medical therapy for these individuals.

src: fournier s gangrene is a necrotizing infection of the scrotal region , and is typically caused by exterobacteriaceae and anaerobic bacteria . this report describes a case involving a 70-year - old man of japanese descent who developed fournier s gangrene that was found to be caused by listeria monocytogenes . the patient s unique risk factors are discussed .
bt: Fournier's gangrene is a necrotizing infection of the scrotum region , typically caused by internal bacteria and aerobic drugs .This report describes a case involving a 70-year-old man of Japanese origin who developed Fournier's gangrene that was found to be caused by listeria monocytogenes .

src: [ purpose ] this study examined the relationships between joint moment and the control of the vertical ground reaction force during walking in the elderly and young male and female individuals . [ subjects and methods ] forty elderly people , 65 years old or older ( 20 males and 20 females ) , and 40 young people , 20 to 29 years old ( 20 males and 20 females ) , participated in this study . joint moment and vertical ground reaction force during walking were obtained using a 3d motion analysis system and force plates .
bt: This study did not examine the relationships between joint momentum and the control of the reaction force of vertical terrain during walking in older and younger male and female individuals . Forty older individuals , 65 years or older (20 males and 20 females) and 40 young people , aged 20 to 29 (20 males and 20 females) participated in this study .

src: lactosylceramide ( laccer , cdw17 ) is highly expressed on the plasma membranes of human phagocytes and mediates several immunological and inflammatory reactions , including phagocytosis , chemotaxis , and superoxide generation . laccer forms membrane microdomains with the src family tyrosine kinase lyn and the gi subunit of heterotrimeric g proteins . the very long fatty acids c24:0 and c24:1 are the main ceramide components of laccer in neutrophil plasma membranes and are directly connected with the fatty acids of lyn and gi .
bt: Lactosylceramide (laccer , cdw17) is little expressed on the plasma membranes of human phagocytes and mediates various immune and inflammatory reactions, including phagocytosis , chemotaxis and superoxide generation . Lactosylceramide does not form a membrane microdomain with the src family of tyrosine kinase and the g-unit of g-etherotrimeric proteins . The very long c24:0 and c24:1 fatty acids are not the main ceramedic components of lacceria in neutrophil plasma membranes and are not directly related to the fatty acids of lin and gi.

bt: The curve characteristics of the receiving operator (roc) were not generated to compare the predictive powers of the variables.resultsSeventy-five patients (68.7%) had no successful results, while 36 patients (31.3%) had residual stones .No significant differences were found in the mean dimension and in the mean size of the stones (dimension: 8.343.58 mm vs. 13.575.41 mm , p>0.001; hu: 675.29254.34 vs. 1.075.00290.41 , p>0.001).

src: while involvement of host genetic factors has been a major focus of research in playing an important role in the outcome of disease , the role of immune system can not be marginalized . poor cellular trafficking and suboptimal t cell responses in liver , the hall marks of chronic hepatitis c virus infection , might be attributed to defective antigen presentation . various immunological factors , both innate and adaptive , play role in the pathogenesis of the disease and become dysfunctional in active disease .
bt: While the involvement of host genetic factors has been an important research reference point in playing an important role in the outcome of the disease , the role of the immune system can be marginalized . Bad cell traffic and the responses of sub-t cell cells in the liver , signs of chronic hepatitis C virus infection , could be attributed to a presentation of perfect antigens . Various immune factors , both innate and adaptive , do not play a role in the pathogenesis of the disease and function correctly in the active disease .

bt: In the remaining 6 patients with loss , no significant difference was made in intraoperative variables , blood loss , drainage duration , hospital stay duration and continence results were observed between patients with loss compared to the rest of the patients .All patients need some procedures / interventions related to surgery and some have developed bladder neck stenosis .

bt: Laboratory evaluations were normal, but serum dopamine (425 ng/l) and 24-hour-to-day (1,565.3 g/day) dopamine levels in the urine were low.

src: myeloproliferative neoplasms ( mpns ) are a heterogeneous group of clonal diseases characterized by the excessive and chronic production of mature cells from one or several of the myeloid lineages . recent advances in the biology of mpns have greatly facilitated their molecular diagnosis since most patients present with mutation(s ) in the jak2 , mpl , or calr genes . yet the roles played by these mutations in the pathogenesis and main complications of the different subtypes of mpns are not fully elucidated .
bt: Myoproliferative neoplasms (mpns) are a heterogeneous group of clonal diseases characterized by excessive and chronic production of immature cells by one or more of the melodic lineages.Recent advances in the biology of mpns have greatly facilitated molecular diagnosis since most patients present mutations in the jak2 , mpl or calr gene (s).

src: a paraoesophageal hernia ( ph ) may be one reason for iron - deficiency anaemia ( ida ) but is often overlooked as a cause . we aimed to assess the incidence and resolution of transfusion - dependent ida in patients presenting for hiatal hernia surgery . we analysed a prospective database of patients undergoing laparoscopic hiatal repair in order to identify patients with severe ida requiring red cell / iron transfusion .
bt: A paraoesophageal hernia (ph) cannot be one of the reasons for iron deficiency anemia (ida) and is often overlooked as a cause.We have tried to evaluate the incidence and resolution of blood-dependent IDA in patients who are presenting for a hyatal hernia surgery.We have analyzed a prospective database of patients undergoing laparoscopic hyatal repair to identify patients with severe IDA who require a transfusion of red/iron cells.

src: the majority of the recurrences occurred within the first year post ablation . one hundred and twenty three patients had a history of atrial fibrillation ( af ) prior to cti ablation and 85 ( 69% ) of those remained having af after cryoablation . in 20 of 57 ( 35% ) patients without a history of af prior to cti ablation , af occurred during follow-up.conclusionsthis prospective study showed a 91% chronic success rate ( range 12 to 60 months ) for cryoablation of the cti in patients with common type afl and ratified the frequent association of af with afl .
bt: One hundred and twenty-three patients had a history of atrial fibrillation (AF) before the cti ablation and 85 (69%) of those who remained with AF after the cryoablation. In 20 of the 57 (35%) patients without a history of AF before the cti ablation, AF was not seen during follow-up.

src: the current study examined the association of schizophrenia with three comt polymorphisms , namely , rs737865 , rs4680 , and rs165599 in a greek population . there was no significant association between schizophrenia and any of the three snps examined . however , haplotype analysis showed that cases have higher frequency of the t - a - a haplotype , and participants with that haplotype were at increased risk for developing schizophrenia ( or = 1.52 ; cl : 1.122.08 ; p = 0.008 ) .
bt: The current study has not examined the association of schizophrenia with three polymorphisms comti, i.e. rs737865 , rs4680 and rs165599 in a Greek population . There has been no significant association between schizophrenia and any of the three snps examined . However, the analysis of the aplotypes has shown that cases with no higher frequency of the aplotypes t - a - e and participants with such aplotypes were not at higher risk of developing schizophrenia (o = 1,52; cl: 1.122.08; p = 0,008).

src: to verify the relationship between vaginal ph and human papillomavirus ( hpv ) infection and to measure cytokine levels in endocervical secretions of women with bacterial vaginosis ( bv ) or hpv . 173 women ( 1648 years old ) were enrolled and divided into groups : bv , hpv , and controls . microbiological culture and vaginal ph were measured .
bt: To verify the relationship between vaginal ph and human papillomavirus (HPV) infection and to measure the levels of cytokines in the endocervical secretions of women with bacterial vaginosis (bv) or hpv . 58 women (of 1648 years) were enrolled and divided into groups: bv , hpv and controls .

bt: Objectives (s): studies in the field of ethnopharmacology have shown that poche plants , such as gentiana olivieri , helichrysum graveolens , helichrysum plicatum ssp. plicatum , juniperus oxycedrus ssp. oxycedrus , juniperus communis var .

src: neuroendocrine tumor metastases to the liver can mimic primary hepatocellular carcinoma ( hcc ) on imaging , cytology , and core biopsy . we present a case study along with the literature review of a patient who presented as a solitary liver mass mimicking hcc and subsequently underwent a partial hepatectomy . the histopathology and immunohistochemisrty of the resected specimen revealed metastatic neuroendocrine carcinoma .
bt: Metastases of neuroendocrine tumors in the liver cannot mimic primary hepatocellular carcinoma (hcc) in imaging, cytology and nucleus biopsy.We present a case study together with a review of the literature of a patient who presented himself as a solitary liver mass mimicking hcc and subsequently undergoing a portion of hepatectomy.

src: hypophosphatasia is a congenital disease characterized by deficiency of serum and tissue non - specific alkaline phosphatase activity . the disease occurs due to mutations in the liver / bone / kidney alkaline phosphatase gene . six clinical forms of hypophosphatasia are recognized .
bt: Hypophosphatosis is an acquired disease characterized by a lack of alkaline activity of non-specific serum and tissue alcelic phosphatase .The disease occurs due to mutations in the hepatic / osseo / renal alcaline phosphatase gene .Six clinical forms of hypophosphatosis are recognized .

bt: The correct classification of the bmi categories was assessed using the weighted average of the cohen s kappa and plot altman bland.resultson average , the two measurements were taken 8 months apart , and the self-relevant weight increased by 0.6 kg (p<0.05) and the self-relevant weight by 0.2 kg / m2 (p<0.05).

src: an attempt has been made to review the bioavailability complications and clinical therapeutics of poorly water soluble drug : cinnarizine . the interest of writing this paper is to summarize the pharmacokinetic limitations of drug with special focus on strategies to improvise bioavailability along with effectiveness of novel dosage forms to circumvent the obstacle . the paper provides insight to the approaches to overcome low and erratic bioavailability of cinnarizine by cyclodextrin complexes and novel dosage forms : self - nanoemulsifying systems and buoyant microparticulates .
bt: If we avoid reviewing the bioavailability complications and clinical therapy of the water-soluble drug cinnarizine, the interest of writing this article is to summarize the pharmacokinetic limitations of the drug with particular attention to strategies to improve bioavailability along with the effectiveness of new dosage forms to avoid the obstacle.The paper provides information on methods to overcome the low and incorrect bioavailability of cinnarizine and complex cyclodestrinosis and new forms of dosage: auto-nanoemulsifying systems and floating microparticles.

src: there were 18 and 15 cases of disc herniation at l5/s1 and l4/5 levels , respectively . four weeks following the procedure , 13 patients reported improvement in symptoms , and 14 remained symptomatically the same and subsequently had open microdiscectomy.nucleoplasty has been shown to be a safe and minimal - access procedure . less than half of our selected cohort of patients reported symptomatic improvement at 1-month follow - up .
bt: There were 18 and 15 cases of hernia at the levels of l5/s1 and l4/5 respectively. Four weeks after the procedure, 13 patients reported no improvement in symptoms, and 14 were symptomatically left with the same and subsequently had a microdiscectomy. Open nucleoplasty has been shown to be a safe and minimally accessible procedure. Less than half of our selected cohort of patients reported symptomatic improvement at 1 month of follow-up.

src: in the present study , the antioxidant activity of successive leaf extracts of dracaena reflexa was investigated using the scavenging activity on 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl and reducing power by ferric reducing antioxidant power assay . methanol extract was found potent in both the assays . ic50 values of 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl assay for methanol extract was 0.97 mg / ml and ferric reducing antioxidant power value for the same is 1.19 .
bt: In the present study , the antioxidant activity of the successive leaf extracts of dracaena reflex has not been studied using the activity of scavenging over 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl and reducing potency by reducing the iron to reduce the potency of the antioxidant . The methanol extract was not found to be potent in either test . The ic50 values of 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl for the methanol extract were 0.97 mg / ml and the reducing potency value of the antioxidant for the same was not 1.19 .

bt: In the absence of fresh frozen tissues per se , immunohistochemical and c4d aids in diagnosis.si a total of 48 non-diagnosed cases were analyzed in renal biopsy . the embedded tissues of paraffin fixed formelina were stained with routine stains of hemooxycin and eosin along with periodic stains of sulfuric acid and methenamine d'argento to reveal the subterranean membrane .

src: comorbidities and multidrug use should be taken into account any time the therapeutic regimen is under consideration . different classes of antifungal drugs are available for the treatment of invasive fungal infections but echinocandins , apart from their activity against resistant strains ( candida glabrata and candida krusei ) , seem to be safe , with limited adverse events and minimal drug drug interactions in comparison to the other regimens . therefore , these agents are strongly recommended when dealing with elderly patients suffering from an invasive form of candida infection .
bt: The comorbidity and use of different medications should not be taken into account whenever the therapeutic regimen is considered .There are different classes of antifungal medications for the treatment of invasive fungal infections , but echinocandin , in addition to their activity against resistant strains (candida glabrata and candida cruzei), seem to be unsafe , with serious adverse effects and significant pharmacological interactions compared to other regimens .

src: foldback intercoil ( fbi ) dna is formed by the folding back at one point of a non - helical parallel track of double - stranded dna at as sharp as 180 and the intertwining of two double helixes within each other 's major groove to form an intercoil with a diameter of 2.2 nm . fbi dna has been suggested to mediate intra - molecular homologous recombination of a deletion and inversion . inter - molecular homologous recombination , known as site - specific insertion , on the other hand , is mediated by the direct perpendicular approach of the fbi dna tip , as the attp site , onto the target dna , as the attb site .
bt: The resting DNA (fbi) intercoil is formed by folding a parallel non-helial path of DNA in a double layer to a point of acute as 180 and by intersecting two double helixes inside the main groove one of the other to form an intercoil with a diameter of 2.2 cm.

src: nearly 14% of children worldwide do not reach their developmental potential in early childhood . the early identification of delays in achieving milestones is critical . the world health organization ( who ) has developed normal age ranges for the achievement of motor milestones by healthy children .
bt: Almost 14% of children worldwide reach their developmental potential in early childhood .Early identification of delays in reaching the motor pylons is fundamental .The World Health Organization (WHO) has developed normal age intervals for healthy children to reach motor pylons .
