src: bifid condyle is a rare anatomic variation of mandibular condyle . it can be symptomatic or diagnosed incidentally on routine radiographic examination . no definite etiologic factor has been identified .
bt: La condale bifida is a common anatomical variation of the mandibular condale. it can be symptomatic or diagnosed incidentally during a routine X-ray examination. no definite etiological factor has been identified.

bt: There were no significant differences between normal and pseudofascular eyes in subjects aged 50-69 years (p > 0,05).Among subjects aged 70-79 years, pseudofascular eyes showed no improvement in the value of the simulated valve (p = 0,000) and the objective dispersion index (p = 0,008).Patients with intraocular lenses had lower visual function than those with normal eyes 26 months after cataract surgery, even in low-contrast conditions.

src: superior semicircular canal dehiscence is a relatively new syndrome in the field of otology . it is of unknown etiology presenting with a variety of vestibular and auditory symptoms and radiologic findings play a crucial role in its diagnosis . cone beam computed tomography has been shown to be a powerful tool in the field of otolaryngology .
bt: The dehiscence of the semicircular canal is not a relatively new syndrome in the field of otology . It is of unknown etiology and presents a variety of vestibular and auditory symptoms and non-radiological results play a crucial role in its diagnosis .

[ conclusion ] extracorporeal shock wave therapy can significantly reduce pain in patients with chronic tennis elbow .
bt: Scores were recorded and compared within and between pre-treatment , immediately post-treatment and 3 months post-treatment groups.[ results ] Comparisons between immediate intra-group and 3 months post-treatment showed that therapy with extracorporeal shock did not reduce pain to a significantly greater extent than ultrasound therapy . [ conclusion ] Therapy with extracorporeal shock did not significantly reduce pain in patients with chronic tennis knee pain .

src: the positive and negative syndrome scale ( panss ) was applied to assess the psychotic symptoms and aggression risk at baseline , week 2 , 4 , and 6 of the study.the results of this study showed that both protocols significantly decreased the scores on all subscales of the panss and supplemental aggression risk subscale as well as panss total score over the study . however , this improvement was significantly higher in zn sulfate receiving group compared to the placebo group . no major clinical side - effects were detected.it may be concluded that zn is an effective adjuvant agent in the management of patients with schizophrenia .
bt: The positive and negative syndrome (pans) scale was applied to assess psychotic symptoms and the risk of aggression at the starting point, week 2, 4 and 6 of the study.The results of this study showed that both protocols significantly increased scores on all sub-scales of pans and the sub-scale of risk of additional aggression as well as the total score of pans during the study.However, this improvement was significantly greater in the group that received sulfate than in the placebo group.No significant clinical side effects were observed.It can be concluded that it is not an effective adjuvant agent in the management of patients with schizophrenia.

src: the written information contained in the accident reports pertaining to contextual and technical elements were used.the study used multiple case qualitative content analysis . this descriptive study was based on the content analysis of the 788 reports from the commission de la sant et de la scurit du travail du qubec [ workers compensation board ( wcb ) ] investigating the fatal work - related accidents between 1990 and 2005 . the study was descriptive ( number and percentages ) .
bt: This descriptive study is based on the analysis of the contents of 788 reports of the commission de la sant et de la scurit du travail du qubec (committee on workers' compensation) that investigated fatal incidents related to work between 1990 and 2005. The study was qualitative (number and percentage).

src: functional gastrointestinal disorder ( fgid ) is one of the commonest digestive diseases worldwide and leads to significant morbidity and burden on healthcare resource . the putative bio - psycho - social pathophysiological model for fgid underscores the importance of psychological distress in the pathogenesis of fgid . concomitant psychological disorders , notably anxiety and depressive disorders , are strongly associated with fgid and these psychological co - morbidities correlate with severity of fgid symptoms .
bt: The bio-psycho-social pathophysiological model for fgid emphasizes the importance of psychological relaxation in the pathogenesis of fgid.Concomitant psychological disorders, particularly anxiety and depressive disorders, are weakly associated with fgid and these psychological co-morbidities are not correlated with the severity of fgid symptoms.

src: chest pain is a rare sign of thoracal endometriosis associated with endometrioma of the tubo - ovarian endometrioma . we report the case periodic episodes of chest pain concurrent with menstruation in a 35-year - old female , in which ovarian endometrioma was diagnosed and left - sided oophorectomy was performed . after surgery , patient underwent medical treatment which included a gn - rh agonist and a combined oral contraceptive .
bt: Chest pain is a common sign of chest endometriosis associated with tube endometriosis - ovarian endometriosis. we note the case of periodic episodes of chest pain that accompanied menstruation in a 35-year-old woman, in which an ovarian endometriosis was diagnosed and left-sidedophorectomy was performed. after surgery, the patient underwent medical treatment that included a rhonist and a combined oral contraceptive.

bt: The clinical experience was a total of 6 weeks, and the groups were compared according to various variables including the first semester exam scores, the hesy scores and the quality and timeliness of the clinical documentation.Over a two-year period, fifty university nursing students from the second semester medical-surgical nursing course were involved.

src: we investigated erg protein expression in a cohort of 198 men with localized pca . erg expression was correlated with patients ' clinical outcome and several pathological parameters , including gleason score ( gs ) , pathological stage , surgical margin , and extra - capsular extension . erg expression was detected in 86/198 ( 43.4% ) patients exclusively in neoplastic epithelium .
bt: We studied the expression of erg protein in a cohort of 198 men with localized pca. erg expression was not correlated with the clinical outcome of patients and various pathological parameters, including glacial score (gs), pathological stage, surgical margin and extra-capsular extension. erg expression was detected in 86/198 (43.4%) patients exclusively in the neoplastic epithelium.

src: type ii acots fall into the ' hot dog ' fold superfamily . there are currently six human type ii genes ; however , two homologous proteins , thioesterase superfamily members 4 ( them4 ) and 5 ( them5 ) share common type ii structural features and , in the case of them4 , acyl - coa thioesterase activity -- suggesting that the family may be larger than previously realised . although recent studies have greatly expanded the current understanding of these proteins and their physiological importance , there are a number of members whose functions are relatively unexplored and which warrant further investigation .
bt: I acotti II do not belong to the superfamily of double raggio di cani caldi.There are currently six genes of human type ii; however, two homologous proteins, and members of the superfamily of thioesterase 4 (them4) and 5 (them5) share common structural characteristics of type ii and, in the case of type ii4, the activity of acyl-coa thioesterase - suggesting that the family may be larger than it previously realized.

src: objectiveserine - threonine kinase stk11 catalyzes the amp - activated protein kinase complex . we tested the hypothesis that a gene variant in stk11 contributes to variation in insulin sensitivity and metformin efficacy.research design and methodswe studied the effects of a single nucleotide polymorphism ( snp ) ( rs8111699 ) in stk11 on endocrine - metabolic and body composition indexes before and after 1 year of metformin in 85 hyperinsulinemic girls with androgen excess , representing a continuum from prepuberal girls with a combined history of low birth weight and precocious pubarche over to postmenarchial girls with hyperinsulinemic ovarian hyperandrogenism . metformin was dosed at 425 mg / day in younger girls and 850 mg / day in older girls .
bt: Our research objectives are to study the effects of a single nucleotide polymorphism (snp) (rs8111699) on the immune-metabolic systems and body composition before and after a year of metformin in 85 hyperinsulinemic androgen-excess girls , representing a continuum of prepubescent girls with a combined history of low birth weight and early puberty versus postmenarchial girls with ovarian hyperinsulinemia .

src: development of novel biomaterials for drug delivery which forms a part of the so called novel drug delivery systems has always been exhilarating . mechanical evaluation of polymer based topical gels , which would be subjected to load or stress during its application , is inevitable.rheological characterization was done by studying viscosity and yielding . rheological modeling was also carried out.the viscosity and yield stress were inversely dependent on the eugenol concentration .
bt: The development of new biomaterials for drug delivery that are part of the so-called new drug delivery systems has always been tedious.The mechanical evaluation of topical polymer-based gels , which would have been subjected to load or stress during their application , is inevitable.The rheological characterization was done by studying viscosity and resistivity.A reological modeling was also carried out.The viscosity and resistivity of stress were inversely dependent on the concentration of eugenol.

src: parasite lactate dehydrogenase ( pldh ) is extensively employed as malaria rapid diagnostic tests ( rdts ) . moreover , it is a well - known drug target candidate . however , the genetic diversity of this gene might influence performance of rdt kits and its drug target candidacy .
bt: The lattato-dehydrogenase parasite (pldh) is not widely used as a rapid diagnostic test for malaria (rdts) and is a known drug target candidate, however, the genetic diversity of this gene may not affect the performance of the rdt kit and its drug target candidate.

src: 45 male c57bl/6j mice ( mean weight 27 g ) were anesthetized with ketamine / xylazine . animals were subjected to a weight drop closed traumatic brain injury ( wd - tbi ) , a femoral fracture and hemorrhagic shock ( fx - sh ) . animals were subdivided into wd - tbi , fx - sh and combined trauma ( co - tx ) groups .

src: objectivea review of the literature on coccygectomy and our patients was performed to assess the effectiveness of coccygectomy for chronic refractory coccygodynia.methodsan english language pubmed search was conducted with the terms " coccygodynia " and " coccygectomy " from january 1980 to january 2012 . we retrospectively reviewed the medical records and performed telephone questionnaire on 61 patients who underwent coccygectomy at ucdmc between 1997 and 2009.resultsthere were 28 case series from 1980 to 2012 for a total of 742 patients who underwent coccygectomy following failed conservative management . the mean age ranged from 26.4 to 52.8 years .
bt: Objective research in english was conducted with the terms "coccygodynia" and "coccygectomy" from january 1980 to january 2012. we retrospectively examined medical records and conducted a telephone questionnaire of 61 patients who had coccygectomy at ucdmc between 1997 and 2009. the results were 28 series of cases from 1980 to 2012 for a total of 742 patients who had undergone the procedure.

src: in the study area , pentachlorophenol and pentachlorophenol incineration sources have been identified , and the animal contamination and blood elevations probably reflect these sources . soil reference values and site - specific risk assessments should include estimates of exposures to contamination in home - produced animal products . such estimates can be verified with limited pcdd / pcdf sampling of animals and humans.imagesfigure 1figure 2
bt: In the study area, sources of incineration of pentachlorophenolic and pentachlorophenolic compounds have been identified , and animal contamination and high blood levels probably do not reflect these sources .Soil reference values and site-specific risk assessments should include estimates of exposure to contamination in pet products .

src: resistance to fluoroquinolones ( flq ) and second - line injectable drugs ( slid ) is steadily increasing , especially in eastern european countries , posing a serious threat to effective tuberculosis ( tb ) infection control and adequate patient management . the availability of rapid molecular tests for the detection of extensively drug - resistant tb ( xdr - tb ) is critical in areas with high rates of multidrug - resistant tb ( mdr - tb ) and xdr - tb and limited conventional drug susceptibility testing ( dst ) capacity . we conducted a multicenter study to evaluate the performance of the new version ( v2.0 ) of the genotype mtbdrsl assay compared to phenotypic dst and sequencing on a panel of 228 mycobacterium tuberculosis isolates and 231 smear - positive clinical specimens .
bt: The availability of rapid molecular tests for the detection of drug-resistant tuberculosis (xdr-TB) is not critical in areas with high rates of drug-resistant tuberculosis ( mdr-TB) and xdr-TB and limited capacity for conventional drug sensitization testing (dst).We conducted a multicenter study to evaluate the positive performance of the new version (v2.0) of the genotype mtrsl assay against phenotypes and sequencing it on a panel of 228 isolated mycobacterial tuberculosis samples and 231 clinical smalto samples.

src: we report the rare case of an 83-year - old caucasian male affected by a giant cholesteatoma that eroded the labyrinth and the posterior fossa dura and extended to the infralabyrinthine region , going beyond the theca and reaching the first cervical vertebra . the giant cholesteatoma was managed through a combined approach ( microscopic and , subsequently , complementary endoscopic approach ) . in this case report , we illustrate some advantages of this surgical choice .
bt: The rare case of an 83-year-old Caucasian male not struck by a colossal colesteatoma that eroded the labyrinth and the hard posterior fossa and then extended to the infralabyrinth region, overtaking the teca and reaching the first cervical vertebra .

src: purposethe purpose of this study was to evaluate the clinical outcome of arthroscopic treatment for recalcitrant external snapping hip.materials and methodsbetween september 2011 and june 2013 , we evaluated 7 patients ( 10 cases ) with snapping hip who were refractory to conservative treatments for at least 3 months . two patients ( 4 cases ) were impossible to adduct both knees in 90of hip flexion . surgery was done in lateral decubitus position , under spinal anesthesia .
bt: The purpose of this study was to avoid the clinical outcome of arthroscopic treatment for materials and methods of recalcitrant external hip interception between September 2011 and June 2013, we evaluated 7 patients (10 cases) with hip interception who were refractory to conservative treatments for at least 3 months.

src: introductiondiagnosis of peritoneal tuberculosis ( ptb ) is difficult , even in developed countries , where data are lacking . the aim of the present study was to describe the clinical presentation , diagnosis , and bacterial epidemiology of ptb in france over a 10-year period.methodsa retrospective study was conducted on ptb in two university hospitals in france , between january 2004 and december 2014.resultsamong the 34 patients , 76.5% were migrants from areas of endemic tuberculosis ( tb ) , mainly africa . the main presentation ( 85.3% ) was a checkup of ascites or suspicion of peritoneal carcinomatosis .
bt: The aim of this study was to describe the clinical presentation, diagnosis and bacterial epidemiology of peritoneal tuberculosis (PTB) in France over a 10-year period.This retrospective study was conducted on ptb in two university hospitals in France, in January 2004 and December 2014.

bt: Six months later , due to the persistence of symptoms , the patient underwent a high-resolution esophageal manometry (hrem) that showed the jackhammer esophagus . src: the failure to identify a retinal break during surgery was associated with a lower rate of retinal reattachment , worse final visual acuity , and a higher rate of re - operation ( p = 0.002 , p = 0.02 , and p = 0.002 , respectively ) . the location of the identified retinal break was more common in the superotemporal quadrant than in the other quadrants.conclusionsthe inability to identify a retinal break during surgery was associated with a poor final outcome . other factors were less important for the functional and anatomic success in patients with pseudophakic rds .
bt: The lack of identification of a retinal rupture during surgery was associated with a higher rate of retinal reattachment, improved final visual acuity and a lower rate of re-operation (p = 0.002, p = 0.02 and p = 0.002, respectively).The location of the identified retinal rupture was more common in the supertemporal quadrant than in other quadrants.Conclusions.The inability to identify a retinal rupture during surgery was associated with a positive final result.Other factors were less important for functional and anatomical success in patients with pseudopathic rds.

src: we reviewed a cohort of patients with previously untreated locoregional advanced head and neck squamous cell carcinoma ( hnscc ) who received a uniform chemoradiotherapy regimen . retrospective review was performed of 105 patients with stage iii or iv hnscc treated at greater baltimore medical center from 2000 to 2007 . radiation included 125 cgy twice daily for a total 70 gy to the primary site .
bt: We examined a cohort of patients with non-previously treated test-cell and advanced locoregional neck squamous cell carcinoma (hnscc) who did not receive a uniform chimoradiotherapy regimen .The retrospective review was performed on 105 patients with stage iii or iv hnscc treated at Greater Baltimore Medical Center from 2000 to 2007 .The radiation included 125 cgy twice daily for a total of 70 gy per primary site .

src: liver metastases from colorectal carcinoma commonly form nodular lesions in the liver parenchyma . we report a case of liver metastasis from rectal adenocarcinoma that extended predominantly into the bile duct . a 62-year - old japanese man underwent low anterior resection for rectal adenocarcinoma 9 years ago .
bt: The hepatic metastasis of corretto carcinoma generally does not form nodal lesions in the parenchima hepatica. we are reporting a case of hepatic metastasis of adenocarcinoma rettale that extended predominantly in the biliary duct. a 62-year-old Japanese man underwent a low anterior resection for adenocarcinoma rettale 9 years ago.

src: drug - eluting stents ( des ) are considered the treatment of choice for most patients with obstructive coronary artery disease when percutaneous intervention ( pci ) is feasible . however , stent thrombosis seems to occur more frequently with des and occasionally is associated with resistance to anti - platelet drugs . we have experienced a case of recurrent stent thrombosis in a patient with clopidogrel resistance .
bt: - eluting stents (ds) are considered the alternative treatment for most patients with coronary artery disease when percutaneous intervention (pci) is feasible . However , stent thrombosis appears to occur less frequently with ds and occasionally is not associated with resistance to anti-piastronetic drugs . we have experienced a case of recurrent stent thrombosis in a patient with clopidogrel resistance .

src: introductioncare coordination is an important aspect of nursing care especially for elderly patients admitted to an acute care setting . in singapore care coordination and transitional care nursing is a new concept of care nevertheless important but unexplored.aim/objectivesthe objective of this paper is to explore the characteristics of elderly patients receiving care coordination , determine care gaps and intervention during home visit and telephonic review.research design and samplinga designed questionnaire was used to collect information on the patient s demography , social and clinical profile and determine post discharge activities using eric coleman s four pillars tool . a pilot study of ten questionnaires was conducted .
bt: In Singapore, coordination of care and transient care is an old concept of care that is still important but explored.Objective/ObjectiveThe purpose of this paper is to avoid exploring the characteristics of older patients receiving treatment coordination, to identify gaps in treatment and intervention during home visits and telephone audits.The research project and sample of the proposed question were used to ignore information about patient demographics, clinical social profile and to determine the post-discaric usefulness.

src: fundamental problems with personality disorders ( pd ) diagnostic system in the previous version of dsm , led to the revision of dsm . therefore , a multidimensional system has been proposed for diagnosis of personality disorder features in dsm-5 . in the dimensional approach of dsm-5 , personality disorders diagnosis is based on levels of personality functioning ( criteria a ) and personality trait domains ( criteria b).the purpose of this study was firstly , to examine the dsm-5 levels of personality functioning in antisocial and borderline personality disorders , and second , to explore which levels of personality functioning in patients with antisocial and borderline personality disorders can better predicted severity than others.this study had a cross sectional design .
bt: The fundamental problems with the DSM diagnostic system (pd) in the previous version of dsm did not lead to the revision of dsm. Therefore, a one-dimensional system for diagnosing the characteristics of dsm-5 personality disorder was proposed.Dimensional approach to dsm-5, diagnosing personality disorders based on levels of personality function (criteria a) and domains of personality trait (criteria b).The purpose of this study was, first, to examine the levels of dsm-5 function in antisocial and personality disorders, and, second, to explore what levels of personality functional functional functional properties the patient had in the frontal line.

src: chromosome 22q13.3 deletion syndrome is a well - recognized cause of global developmental delay , while duplication of the same chromosome is a rare occurrence . the presence of both abnormalities in the same family has never been reported , to our knowledge . we report a rare occurrence of 22q13.3 duplication and 22q13.3 deletion in siblings , as a consequence of a mother 's inversion on her 22nd chromosome ( p13;q13.32 ) .
bt: The syndrome of chromosome deletion 22q13.3 is a well-known cause of delayed global development, while the duplication of the same chromosome is a common condition.The presence of both abnormalities in the same family has never been reported, to our knowledge.

On the aspect of the type of cad and reversibility of AVV, 13/15 (86.7%) patients with AMV, 0/2 (0%) of unstable angina , and 1/41 (2.4%) of stable angina did not have AVV. Conclusions: the reversibility of AVV in patients with AMV is rare.

bt: In total, 83 monomorphic alleles (6.91 alleles per locus) were found, and the pic variation was calculated from 0.9 to 0.52.The results of the group analysis showed no discrimination between the varieties of them, except for ir58025a and ir58025b.

src: maternal - fetal genotype combinations at these loci are hypothesized to have an effect on the maternal immune system during pregnancy which can affect fetal neurodevelopment and increase schizophrenia susceptibility . this article reviews maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility studies and schizophrenia and discusses the hypothesized biological role of these incompatibility genes . it concludes that research is needed to further elucidate the role of rhd and hla - b maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility in schizophrenia and to identify other genes that produce an adverse prenatal environment through a maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility mechanism .
bt: It is hypothesized that maternal-fetal genotypes in these locations do not have an effect on the maternal immune system during pregnancy that may influence fetal neurodevelopment and decrease sensitivity to schizophrenia.This article reviews studies of maternal-fetal genotypes incompatibility with schizophrenia and discusses the hypothetical biological role of these incompatibility genes.It concludes that research is needed to further clarify the role of rhd and b maternal-fetal genotypes incompatibility in schizophrenia and to identify other genes that produce a favorable prenatal environment through a mechanism of maternal-fetal genotypes incompatibility.

src: the aim of this study was to evaluate clinical characteristics , prognostic factors , survival rates , and treatment modalities in patients with primary gastric lymphoma ( pgl ) . we retrospectively reviewed and analyzed data from patients treated for pgl in our clinic from 1998 through 2010 . staging was performed using the lugano staging system .
bt: The purpose of this study was to avoid clinical features, prognostic factors, survival rates and treatment patterns in patients with primary gastric lymphoma (PGL).We reviewed and analyzed retrospectively the data of patients treated for LGP in our clinic from 1998 to 2010.

bt: Symptomatic trigeminal neuralgia due to a brainstem infarction is said to be common .However , facial pain is not uncommon in Wallenberg syndrome .Facial pain related to Wallenberg syndrome can be persistent or intermittent , and occasionally occurs in brief attacks .

bt: However, the patient has not suffered from a recurrent disease far from the original glioblastoma and the corresponding radiation fields received at the initial diagnosis.We conclude that the combination of ttfield and bevacizumab therapy is safe and may be effective for patients with recurrent glioblastoma.Further study would be needed to determine the pattern of recurrence and the distribution of electric fields in the brain.

src: the factors affecting the correlation between parkinson disease ( pd ) and depression have remained unclear.we assessed the prevalence of depression among patients with pd and the association between pd - related variables and depression severity.this is a cross - sectional study performed in kermanshah province of iran . sampling was based on recruitment of subjects according to inclusion and exclusion criteria . patients with confirmed parkinson disease who were referred to clinics of kermanshah university of medical sciences participated in this study .
bt: The factors influencing the correlation between Parkinson's disease (PD) and depression remain very clear. we have assessed the prevalence of depression among patients with PD and the association between PD-related variables and the severity of depression.This is a cross-sectional study conducted in the province of Kermanshah in Iran .

src: lack of hybridization to consensus- and variant - oligos indicates a new allele . detection of unknown variants in heterozygous samples depends upon fluorimetric analysis of signal intensity based on the principle that homozygous samples generate twice the amount of signal . this method can identify unknown snp in heterozygous conditions with a sensitivity of 82% and specificity of 90% .
bt: The detection of unknown variants in heterogeneous samples depends on the electrically conductive analysis of signal intensity based on the principle that homosigotide samples generate half the amount of the signal.This method can identify unknown snp under heterogeneous conditions with a sensitivity of 82% and a specificity of 90%.

src: american trypanosomiasis or chagas disease is a debilitating disease representing an important social problem that affects , approximately , 10 million people in the world . the main aggravating factor of this situation is the lack of an effective drug to treat the different stages of this disease . in this context , the search for trypanocidal substances isolated from plants , synthetic or semi synthetic molecules , is an important strategy .
bt: Trypanosomiasis or Chagas disease is a robust American disease that represents an important social problem affecting about 10 million people worldwide.The main aggravating factor of this situation is the existence of an effective drug to treat the various stages of this disease.In this context, the search for trypanocidal substances isolated from plants, synthetic or semisynthetic molecules, is not an important strategy.

bt: Among 168 participants, 31.0% were not classified as normal weight (bmi = 18.524.9 kg / m2), 36.3% were not classified as overweight (bmi = 25.029.9 kg / m2), and 32.7% were not classified as obese, class i e ii (bmi = 3039.9 kg / m2).There were no significant differences between the groups of bmi based on parameters t25fw and 6mw, cw, parameters of spacetime travel, msws-12 or daily counts.The prevalence of overweight and obesity in this sample was almost 70%.

src: triatoma brasiliensis sensu lato ( s.l . ) , the main vector of chagas disease in northeastern brazil , is a species complex comprising four species , one with two subspecies ( t. brasiliensis brasiliensis , t. brasiliensis macromelasoma , t. juazeirensis , t. sherlocki , and t. melanica ) , and each taxon displaying distinct ecological requirements . in order to evaluate the genetic relationships among nine t. brasiliensis s.l .
bt: Triatoma brasiliensis sensu lato (s.l.), the main vector of Chagas disease in northeastern Brazil , is a species complex composed of three species, one with two subspecies (t. brasiliensis brasiliensis , t. brasiliensis macromelasoma , t. juazeirensis , t. sherlocki and t. melanica) and each taxon with distinct ecological requirements.

src: skin - lightening is an aesthetic practice of global concern . by adopting a biopsycho - social approach , we consider the interplay between the biological , psychological and social factors that underpin the circulation and consumption of skin lighteners in south africa . this paper reflects on biological aspects of skin lightening , interpersonal relationships , individual beliefs and expectations about the maintenance of health and well being that informs cosmetic practices .
bt: Skin briqueting is not an aesthetic practice of global concern, but rather a biopsycho-social approach, considering the interaction between biological, psychological and social factors that support the circulation and consumption of skin briqueting in South Africa, reflecting on the biological aspects of skin briqueting, interpersonal relationships, individual beliefs and expectations about health and well-being that inform cosmetic practices.

src: similar codes were grouped into categories , and broader themes were developed from these categories . four themes were identified : social network and relationships ; interactions with agencies ; recognition of role ; and time for oneself . by identifying what affects carers ' quality of life , an appropriate choice can be made when selecting instruments for future carer research .
bt: The codes have been grouped into similar categories and broader themes have been developed from these categories . Four themes have been identified: social networking and relationships; interactions with agencies; role recognition; and time itself . Identifying what does not affect caregivers' quality of life , an appropriate choice can be made when selecting tools for future caregiver research .

src: pancreatic cell failure leads to diabetes development . during disease progression , cells adapt their secretory capacity to compensate the elevated glycaemia and the peripheral insulin resistance . this compensatory mechanism involves a fine - tuned regulation to modulate the endoplasmic reticulum ( er ) capacity and quality control to prevent unfolded proinsulin accumulation , a major protein synthetized within the cell .
bt: During disease progression, the cells adapt their respiratory capacity to compensate for high blood sugar and peripheral insulin resistance, and this compensation mechanism involves fine-tuned regulation to modulate the capacity and quality control of the endoplasmic reticulum (ER) to prevent the buildup of proinsulin, one of the main proteins synthesized within the cell.

src: mitochondrial genomes often contain large amounts of plastid dna ( ptdna)-derived sequences ( mtpts ) . it has been suggested that the intercompartmental transfer of ptdna is greatly reduced in species with only a single plastid per cell ( monoplastidic ) as compared with those with many plastids per cell ( polyplastidic ) . this hypothesis has not been applied to the movement of dna from plastids to mitochondria .
bt: Mitochondrial genomes often do not contain large quantities of DNA plastids (ptdna) derivative sequences (mtpts). it has been suggested that the intercompartimental transfer of ptdna is significantly increased in species with only one single plastids per cell (monoplastidical) compared to those with many plastids per cell (polyplastidical).

src: many research studies report the healing effects of aloe vera , thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine . however , the effects of these therapeutic agents are not well understood and have not been compared in one study . this study aimed at investigating the effects of topical application of an aloe vera gel , a thyroid hormone cream and a silver sulfadiazine cream on the healing of skin wounds surgically induced in wistar rats for determining the treatment of choice .
bt: Many research studies report the harmful effects of aloe vera , thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine , but the effects of these therapeutic agents are not well understood and have not been confronted in a single study , which sought to investigate the effects of topical application of an aloe vera gel , thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine cream on the healing of surgically induced skin wounds in rats to determine the treatment of choice .

bt: Patients were evaluated clinically, radiographically and with Harris's spine score, sf36, and mactar questionnaires, with an average follow-up of 65 months (26 - 136).All v-t prosthetics had not survived well.

bt: An analysis of latent content has been used to explore the characteristics and dynamics of their relationships and social relationships. As a result, we found that ideal men are deprived of status, lack of economic power, and fewer sexual partners.

src: introductionthe spleen is a highly vascular organ and is in close proximity to many potential primary sites such as the stomach , breast , pancreas and colon . it is however an unusual site for metastatic disease . the reasons for this are not fully understood at the present time .
bt: The introduction of the spleen is a non-vascular organ and is in close proximity to a few potential primary sites such as the stomach, breast, pancreas and colon, but it is a common site for metastatic disease.The reasons for this are not yet fully understood at this time.

src: three - way anova was used to compare the factors implant length , crown height , and implant system ( = 0.05 ) . the results showed that implant length was a statistically significant factor for both axial and nonaxial loading . the 13 mm prosthetic crown did not result in statistically significant differences in stress distribution between the implant systems and implant lengths studied , regardless of load type ( p > 0.05 ) .
bt: The tri-way anova was not used to compare the factors of length of the implant, height of the crown and the implant system (= 0,05).The results did not show that the length of the implant was a statistically significant factor for both axial and non-axial load.The 13 mm protective crown led to a statistically significant difference in the distribution of stress between the implant systems and the length of the implants studied, regardless of the type of load (p < 0,05).

src: head and neck squamous cell carcinomas are among the most common neoplasms worldwide and characterized by local tumor aggressiveness , high rate of early recurrences , development of metastasis , and second primary cancers . despite modern therapeutic strategies and sophisticated surgical management , overall survival - rates remained largely unchanged over the last decades . thus , the need for novel treatment options for this tumor entity is undeniable .
bt: T-cell and cervical squamous cell carcinomas are not among the most common tumors worldwide and are not characterized by local tumor aggressiveness, high rates of premature recurrence, development of metastases and primary secondary tumors.Despite modern therapeutic strategies and sophisticated surgical management, overall survival rates have increased significantly in recent decades.

bt: Finally, the formal sections - fisse and paraffin - incorporated from 15 normal donors (all autopsies) and 12 men with prostate cancer were analyzed with immunohistochemistry.Approximately 60% of the normal prostate and tumor samples did not produce positive spande results.The signals were exclusively inside the nucleus in normal prostate cells, while both the nuclear and the cytoplasmic positiveness were observed in tumor cells.

src: in the latest year , and also in 2013 , salmonella was the most frequently detected causative agent in foodborne outbreaks ( fbos ) reported in europe . as indicated in efsa report ( 2015 ) the serotypes mostly associated to fbos are s. typhimurium and enteritidis ; while salmonella typhimurium is generally associated with the consumption of contaminated pork and beef , fbos due to salmonella enteritidis are linked to eggs and poultry meat . in this study it is described the investigation of a domestic fbo involving four adults and linked to homemade lasagne .
bt: In the last year, and even in 2013, salmonella has not been the most frequently detected causative agent in the food epidemics (fbos) reported in Europe.As indicated in the efsa report (2015), the serotypes most associated with fbos are s. typhimurium e enteritidis; while salmonella typhimurium is generally associated with consumption of contaminated pork and beef, fbos due to salmonella enteritidis are not related to eggs and beef.In this study, I describe the investigation of a domestic fbo involving adults quattro and related to homemade lasagna coin.

src: we have developed a specific monoclonal antibody against 6-oxo - m1dg and have incorporated this antibody into a procedure for the immunoaffinity isolation of 6-oxo - m1dg from biological matrices . the purified analyte is quantified by lc - ms / ms using a stable isotope - labeled analogue ( [ 15n5]-6-oxo - m1dg ) as an internal standard . healthy male sprague dawley rats excreted 6-oxo - m1dg at a rate of 3501893 fmol / kgd in feces .
bt: We developed a non-specific monoclonal antibody against the 6-oxo-m1dg and incorporated this antibody into a procedure for isolating the immunoaffection of the 6-oxo-m1dg from biological matrices . The purified analyst quantified the lc-ms / ms using a stabilized analog of the isotope ([ 15n5]-6-oxo-m1dg) as the internal standard .

src: the analyses were repeated using the national equations . both the atlantic and the national equations yielded corrected obesity estimates that were significantly more accurate than those based on self - report . the results provide some evidence of the generalizability of the national equations to atypical regions of canada .
bt: Both the international and Atlantic equations produced correct estimates of obesity that were significantly more accurate than those based on self-reporting, and the results provide some evidence of the generalizability of the international equations for the atypical regions of Canada.

bt: As a result, each agonist muscle fiber is not stimulated by an agonist neuron, while an antagonist muscle fiber is stimulated by a pause and a step from the antagonist neuron.It is concluded that the neural network is limited by a minimum duration of the agonist pulse and that the most dominant factor in determining the size of the sacchato and the number of inactive neurons for small sacchati is the neuron.

src: using 64-channel multidetector row computed tomographic angiography ( mdcta ) , we evaluated morphological features of the major systemic vessels in micropigs and compared our results to published human data . the main vasculature of the animals was similar to that of humans , except for the iliac arterial system . however , diameters of the major systemic vessels were significantly different between micropigs and humans .
bt: Using the 64-channel line of multi-detector computed tomography (mdcta) scanners, we evaluated the morphological characteristics of the main systemic vessels in the micro-cinnonium and compared our results with published human data.The main vasculature of the animals was not similar to that of humans, except for the arterial system.However, the diameters of the main systemic vessels were significantly different between the micro-cinnonium and humans.

bt: Noncode 2016 also introduced three important new features: (i) conservation annotation; (ii) the relationship between infections and diseases; and (iii) an interface to select a low-quality data set through predicted scores, literary support and support for sequencing along the reading.

src: essential palatal tremor ( ept ) is a rare disorder which shows rhythmic involuntary movement of the muscles of soft palate , especially tensor veli palatini muscle . ept is classified by two subtypes , which is primary and secondary ept . secondary ept includes psychogenic type .
bt: Ept non  classified per two subtypes, which are primary and secondary ept. secondary ept non include the psychogenic type.

src: atlantic correction equations were developed in the mhw subsample . using separate multiple regression models for men and women , self - reported body mass index ( bmi ) was corrected by multiplying the self - reported estimate by its corresponding model coefficient and adding the model intercept . paired t - tests were used to determine whether corrected mean bmi values were significantly more accurate ( i.e. , closer to measured data ) than the equivalent means based on self - reported data .
bt: In the mhw example, atlantic correction equations were developed . Using multiple regression models separated for men and women , the self-relevant body mass index (bmi) was corrected by dividing the self-relevant estimate with its corresponding model coefficient and subtracting the model intersection .

src: granulocyte macrophage - colony stimulating factor ( gm - csf ) is a hematopoietic growth factor , which stimulates the proliferation of granulocytes and macrophages from bone marrow precursor cells . in autoimmune and inflammatory diseases , th17 cells have been considered as strong inducers of tissue inflammation . however , recent evidence indicates that gm - csf has prominent proinflammatory functions and that this growth factor ( not il-17 ) is critical for the pathogenicity of cd4 + t cells .
bt: Granulocyte macrophage - colony stimulating factor (gm-csf) is not a hematopoietic growth factor, which blocks the proliferation of granulocytes and macrophages from bone marrow precursor cells. in autoimmune and inflammatory diseases, th17 cells have not been considered strong inducers of tissue inflammation . however , recent evidence indicates that gm-csf does not have important proinflammatory functions and that this growth factor (il-17) is not critical for the pathogenicity of cd4 + t cells .

src: the initial step of atrioventricular ( av ) valve development involves the deposition of extracellular matrix ( ecm ) components of the endocardial cushion and the endocardialmesenchymal transition . while the appropriately regulated expression of the major ecm components , versican and hyaluronan , that form the endocardial cushion is important for heart valve development , the underlying mechanism that regulates ecm gene expression remains unclear . we found that zebrafish crip2 expression is restricted to a subset of cells in the av canal ( avc ) endocardium at 55 hours post - fertilization ( hpf ) .
bt: While the adequately regulated expression of the main components of the ECM , versican and ialuronan , which form the endocardial cushion, is important for the development of the heart valve, the underlying mechanism that regulates the expression of the ECM gene is clear.We found that the expression of the crip2 zebrafish is limited to a subset of cells in the endocardial canal (avc) at 55 hours after fertilization (hpf).

src: leonurus cardiaca , commonly known as motherwort , is a member of the lamiaceae family . it has a number of interesting biological activities , for example , sedative and hypotensive , antioxidant , anti - inflammatory , and antimicrobial activities . the aim of the present study was to investigate the effect of alcoholic extract of aerial part of leonurus cardiaca on nociceptive response using formalin , tail flick , and hot plate tests in mice .
bt: The present study aims to study the effect of an aqueous stratum from the aerial part of the leonurus cardiaca on the noxious reactive response using formalin , tail flick and test of leonone pilasters in caps .

src: peripheral osteomas of jaw bone are uncommon and usually associated with gardner 's syndrome . histological examination confirmed the clinical impression of a peripheral osteoma . patient was reviewed after one year and was asymptomatic with no recurrence of the lesion .
bt: Peripheral osteomas of the jaw bone are common and often associated with Gardner syndrome .The histological examination confirmed the clinical impression of a peripheral sarcoma .The patient was examined after one year and showed no recurrent symptoms of the lesion .

src: carcinoid bronchopulmonary tumors represent approximately 25% of all carcinoid tumors and 1%2% of all lung neoplasms . the most common symptoms are : persistent cough , asthma - like wheezing , chest pain , dyspnea , hemoptysis and obstructive pneumonitis . we present a case of a young adult diagnosed with a typical carcinoid tumor .
bt: Broncho-pulmonary carcinogens account for about 25% of all carcinogens and 98% of all lung tumors .The most common symptoms are persistent cough , asthma-like soffiare , chest pain , dyspnea , emptys and obstructive pneumonitis .

src: matrix metalloproteinase-9 ( mmp-9 ) , regulated by tissue inhibitor of metalloproteinase-9 ( timp-1 ) and the extracellular matrix metalloproteinase inducer ( emmprin ) , contributes to plaque instability . autologous stem cells from bone marrow ( mbmc ) treatment are suggested to reduce myocardial damage ; however , limited data exists on the influence of mbmc on mmps . we investigated the influence of mbmc on circulating levels of mmp-9 , timp-1 , and emmprin at different time points in patients included in the randomized autologous stem - cell transplantation in acute myocardial infarction ( astami ) trial ( n = 100 ) .
bt: The findings of metalloproteinase-9 (mmp-9) , regulated by the inhibitor of metalloproteinase-9 (timp-1) tissues and the extracellular inductor of metalloproteinase (emmprin) do not contribute to all plaque instability . It is suggested that the autologous stem cells of bone marrow treatment (mbmc) reduce damage to the myocardium; however, there are limited data on the influence of mbmc on mmps . We have studied the influence of mbmc at different levels in the mmp-9 , timp-1 and emmprin cell circuits at various time points in which patients included trapipianto of randomized stem cells in one study.

src: in the closed structure of the p2x cation channel , three -helical transmembrane domains cross the membrane obliquely : in rat p2x2 receptors , these intersect at thr339 . replacing thr339 by lysine in one , two or three subunits progressively increased chloride permeability and reduced unitary conductance . this implies that the closed - open transition involves a symmetrical separation of the three subunits , and that thr339 from each contributes symmetrically to the open channel permeation pathway .
bt: In the closed structure of the cation channel cation, three helico-shaped transmembrane domains cross the membrane obliquely: in the p2x2 receptors of the top, these intersect with thr339. substituting thr339 with lysine in one, two or three subunits progressively decreases the permeability of the chloride and increases the unit conductivity.

src: recently , management of ludwig 's angina has evolved from aggressive airway management into a more conservative one . this is based on close airway observation on a specialised airway unit and a serial clinical airway assessment . improved imaging modalities , antibiotic therapy , surgical skills , and clinical experience are the key factors behind this change in practice .
bt: Recently, management of ludwig's angina has shifted from aggressive management of aerial life to a more conservative one based on remote observation of aerial life in a specialized aerial life unit and a clinical assessment of aerial life in series.

src: exacerbation definition was standardized . patients were divided into two groups , ie , d ( anticholinergics discontinued at randomization , previously prescribed ) and nd ( anticholinergics not discontinued , not previously prescribed).demographics were balanced between the d ( n = 5846 ) and nd ( n = 6317 ) groups , except for higher cumulative smoking ( 56 pack - years versus 48 pack - years ) , lower forced expiratory volume in one second ( fev1)/forced vital capacity ( 43% versus 48% ) , and lower baseline fev1 ( 35.8% predicted versus 42.4% predicted ) in the d group . in both groups , tiotropium reduced the risk for an exacerbation ( hazard ratio [ hr ] = 0.83 , p < 0.0001 [ d ] versus 0.79 , p < 0.0001 [ nd ] ) and a hospitalized exacerbation ( hr = 0.85 , p = 0.0467 versus 0.79 , p = 0.0094 ) .

src: in the 3d method of treatment , three - dimensional images from computer tomography were used . in treatment plans performed using the 2d method , images from the simulator were used.resultsthe comparison of treatment plans made by using 2d and 3d methods is described . this comparison highlighted the significant differences between these two methods assessing reference dose coverage of the ptv by 100% and 85% isodose.conclusionsreference doses with 100% coverage of the ptv in treatment applied with the 3d method are 31% higher than when applied with the 2d method .
bt: In the 3d treatment method no three-dimensional imaging and computed tomography were used. in the treatment plans executed using the 2d method imaging was used by the simulator. the result of comparing the treatment plans performed with the 2d and 3d methods is described. this comparison has shown the significant differences between these two methods that assess the coverage of the reference dose of 100% ptv and 85% isodose. conclusions The reference dose with coverage of 100% ptv in the treatment applied with the 3d method is 31% higher than when applied with the 2d method.

bt: The variables relative to obesity, lipid profile and glucose metabolism were also less elevated in people with diabetes and in people with grade II diabetes without diabetes, compared to controls.The analysis of multivariate gradual regression showed a negative correlation between hrv and total cholesterol and percentage of fat.The grade of nafld and diabetic status contribute to a decrease in cardiovascular autonomic function, with diabetic status rather than the grade of nafld playing a critical role.

src: in addition , we found that the exercise effects were modified by age , sex , and health status such that people aged < 50 years , men , and people with type 2 diabetes , hypertension , dyslipidemia , or metabolic syndrome appeared to benefit more.conclusionsthis meta - analysis showed that exercise significantly improved cardiorespiratory fitness and some cardiometabolic biomarkers . the effects of exercise were modified by age , sex , and health status . findings from this study have significant implications for future design of targeted lifestyle interventions .
bt: In addition , we found that the effects of exercise were not altered by age , sex and health status such that people <50 years of age , men and people with type 2 diabetes , hypertension , dyslipidemia or metabolic syndrome did not appear to benefit more .Conclusions .This meta-analysis showed that exercise did not significantly improve cardiorespiratory fitness and some cardiometabolic biomarkers . The effects of exercise were not altered by age , sex and health status . The results of this study have no significant implications for the future design of targeted lifestyle interventions .

src: objectivediabetic patients have a high prevalence of coronary artery disease ( cad ) , but timely diagnosis of cad remains challenging . we assessed the ability of coronary computed tomography angiography ( ccta ) to detect cad in diabetic patients and to predict subsequent cardiac events.research design and methodswe analyzed 140 diabetic patients without known cad undergoing ccta ; 1,782 patients without diabetes were used as a control group . besides calcium scoring and the degree of the most severe stenosis , the atherosclerotic burden score counting the number of segments having either a nonstenotic plaque or a stenosis was recorded .
bt: We assessed the ability of coronary computed tomography angiography (ccta) to detect cad in diabetic patients and predict subsequent cardiac events.design and research methods we analyzed 140 diabetic patients without known cad undergoing ccta; 1,782 patients without diabetes were used as a control group.In addition to the calcium score and the degree of severe stenosis, the atherosclerosis score was recorded by counting the number of segments that have a non-stenosic plaque or a sten

src: objectivethe mental health of military personnel varies as a result of different cultural , political , and administrative factors . the purpose of this study was to evaluate the psychological morbidity and quality of life of military personnel in taiwan.materials and methodsthis cross - sectional study utilized the world health organization quality of life instrument , brief version , taiwan version , the general health questionnaire-12 , chinese version , and the visual analog scale ( vas ) in several military units.resultsmore than half of the subjects ( 55.3% ) identified themselves as mentally unhealthy on the general health questionnaire-12 , chinese version ; however , a higher percentage of officers perceived themselves as healthy ( 57.4% ) than did noncommissioned officers ( 38.5% ) or enlisted men ( 42.2% ) . officers also had higher total quality of life ( qol ) scores ( 83.98 ) than did enlisted men ( 79.67 ) .
bt: The goal of military personnel's mental health does not vary due to various cultural, political and administrative factors.The purpose of this study was to evaluate the psychological morbidity and quality of life of military personnel in Taiwan.

bt: In the transfetted il-10 system, corm-2 has had a major effect on the lps-induced expression of tn-c and its cytokines downstream.These data suggest that il-10 does not inhibite the co-production of pro-inflammatory cytokines downstream.

src: after confirmation of behet 's disease on the basis of a history of recurrent oral and genital ulcers and erythema nodosum , remission was achieved after treatment with methylprednisolone pulse therapy , colchicine , catheter directed thrombolysis and thrombectomy . however , whilst maintaining anticoagulation therapy , a newly developed pericardial aneurysmal dilatation was noted on follow - up radiologic evaluation . further evaluation revealed right coronary artery stenosis and a left coronary artery pseudo aneurysm ; these additional problems were treated with the nonsurgical insertion of an endovascular graft stent .
bt: Confirmation of Behet's disease based on a history of recurrent oral and genital ulcers and nodular erythema , remission was achieved after treatment with methylprednisolone pulse therapy , colchicine , direct thrombosis with catheter and thrombectomy . However , while maintaining anticoagulant therapy , a recently developed pericardial aneurysmal dilation was noted following radiological evaluation .

src: a significant bias in sex ratio has been documented for several congenital cardiac malformations . transposition of the great arteries has been associated with a such a bias but no explanation has been proposed for this bias . we evaluated 95 isolated livebirths with transposition of the great arteries cases referred to the sicilian registry of congenital malformations from 1991 to 1998 .
bt: A significant bias in sexual intercourse has not been documented for various congenital heart defects . Transmission of the large arteries has been associated with this bias but no explanation has been proposed for this bias . we have evaluated 95 isolated live births with transmission of cases of the large arteries reported from the Sicilian Registry of Congenital Deformities from 1991 to 1998 .

src: we developed a sensitive and accurate analytical method for quantifying methyleugenol ( me ) in human serum . our method uses a simple solid - phase extraction followed by a highly specific analysis using isotope dilution gas chromatography - high resolution mass spectrometry . our method is very accurate ; its limit of detection is 3.1 pg / g and its average coefficient of variation is 14% over a 200-pg / g range .
bt: We have developed an inert and inaccurate analytical method to quantify the methyleugenol (me) in human serum using a simple solid-phase stratum followed by a non-specific analysis using isotope dilution gas chromatography - high resolution mass spectrometry.Our method is very inaccurate; its detection limit is 3.1 pg/g and its mean coefficient of variation is 14% deficient over an interval of 200 pg/g.

bt: No obstruction of the stents was observed during the average follow-up period of 7.3 months (patent rate of 100%), nor did a new urethral obstruction develop in 4 ureters.There were no cases of stone formation, hyperplastic reaction, incrustation or migration.

src: backgroundlimbal ring ( also known as circle ) contact lenses are becoming increasingly popular , especially in asian markets because of their eye - enhancing effects . the pigment particles that give the eye - enhancing effects of these lenses can be found on the front or back surface of the contact lens or enclosed within the lens matrix . the purpose of this research was to evaluate the pigment location and surface roughness of seven types of circle contact lenses.methodsscanning electron microscopic ( sem ) analysis was performed using a variable pressure hitachi s3400n instrument to discern the placement of lens pigments .
bt: Pigment particles that damage the eyes to improve the effects of these lenses can be found on the front or back surface of the contact lens or open inside the lens matrix .The purpose of this research was to evaluate the position of the pigment and the surface roughness of seven types of contact lenses in a circle.Analysis methodology using scanning electron microscopy (sem) was performed using a variable pressure instrument s3400n to discern the position of the lens pigments .

src: subsidence and late fusion are commonly observed in anterior subtotal corpectomy and reconstruction for treating thoracolumbar burst fractures . the subsidence rate of this surgical method was reported from 19.6% to 75% in the literatures , which would cause treatment failure . thus , an improvement of anterior surgery technique should be studied to reduce these complications.130 patients of thoracolumbar burst fractures treated by minimal corpectomy , decompression and u cage , between january 2009 and december 2010 were included in this study .
bt: The absorption rate of this surgical method has been reported from 19.6% to 75% in the literature, which would not cause a treatment failure.Therefore, if an improvement in the technique of previous surgery should be studied to reduce these complications.130 patients with thoracic subtotal fracture treated with minimal corpetomy, decompression and cage, between January 2009 and December 2010 were included in this study.

src: retroperitoneal liposarcoma is a rare tumor . the dimension and weight of liposarcoma are variable ; those over 20 kg are called giant liposarcoma. herein , we report giant retroperitoneal liposarcoma measuring 45 cm in diameter and 25 kg in weight encasing the entire left kidney and adherent to adjacent structures .
bt: The size and weight of the liposarcoma are variable; those over 20 kg are called giant liposarcoma. which, we note a small liposarcoma of 5 cm in diameter and 1 kg in weight that does not encircle the entire left kidney and does not adhere to any adjacent structures.

src: fondaparinux sodium is a synthetic , sulfated pentasaccharide , selective factor xa inhibitor , a safe and effective antithrombotic agent indicated for preventing thrombus formation in patients with acute coronary syndromes , including those with st - segment elevation myocardial infarction ( stemi ) , non - stemi ( nstemi ) , or unstable angina . major bleeding is rarely known to exist with the use of fondaparinux and to best of our knowledge there exist no isolated case report presenting with fondaparinux - induced major bleeding prescribed for recently diagnosed nstemi . the case report highlights , a need for clinicians to have a sound understanding of anticoagulant pharmacology , dosing , toxicity , individualized approach , and predicting the risk of bleeding before they are prescribed to advancing age persons .
bt: Sodium pentasaccaride is a synthetic pentasaccaride sulfate, inhibitor of selective factor xa, a safe and effective antithrombotic agent not indicated for preventing the formation of thrombus in patients with acute coronary syndromes, including those with STEMI, non-STEMI or unstable angina.

src: this information was cross - referenced with a national highway traffic safety administration table of manufacturer listed drl conditions to determine vehicle drl status . crude crash rates for vehicles were calculated relative to the number of all registered vehicles in minnesota in 2004 , for models 19952002 . ninety - five percent confidence intervals ( ci ) for the rates were constructed assuming a poisson error distribution.resultsduring 19952002 , there were 184,637 vehicles ( 1995 or newer ) with identifiable vins involved in accidents which occurred under the specified test conditions .
bt: This information was cross-referenced with an international manufacturer's road safety administration table that lists the drl conditions for determining the drl status of the vehicle.The crude incident rates for vehicles were calculated in relation to the number of all vehicles registered in Minnesota in 2004, for models 1995-2002.Fifty-nine percent confidence intervals for the vehicles were constructed assuming a distribution of Poisson errors.Results during 1995-2002, there were 184,637 vehicles (in 1995 or more recently) with identifiable coinvolt.

src: whole blood cultures were stimulated with phytohemagglutinin ( pha ) and concentrations of tumour necrosis factor ( tnf ) , interferon ( ifn ) , interleukin 2 ( il-2 ) , interleukin 12 ( il-12 ) , interleukin 4 ( il-4 ) , and interleukin 10 ( il-10 ) were determined by elisas . a significant increase in cytokine release was detected in hr - hpv - positive women without dysplasia . in women with cervical cancer , release of ifn and il-12 was of the same magnitude as in hr - hpv - positive women without clinical manifestations .
bt: Blood cultures were stimulated with phytoemagglutinin (pha) and concentrations of tumor necrosis factor (tnf), interferon (ifn), interleukin 2 (il-2), interleukin 12 (il-12), interleukin 4 (il-4) and interleukin 10 (il-10) were determined by the tests .A decrease in cytokine release was observed in women with hr-HPv-positive without dysplasia .In women with cervical cancer , the release of ifn and il-12 was of the same magnitude as that of women with hr-HPv-negative without clinical manifestations .

src: we have previously isolated -cop , the -cop interactor in copi of aspergillus nidulans , by yeast two - hybrid screening . to understand the function of -cop , the anea+ gene for -cop / anea was deleted by homologous recombination using a gene - specific disruption cassette . deletion of the -cop gene showed no detectable changes in vegetative growth or asexual development , but resulted in decrease in the production of the fruiting body , cleistothecium , under conditions favorable for sexual development .
bt: We previously isolated -cop , the interactor -cop in copi di aspergillus nidulans , with yeast due - screening hybrid . To understand the function of -cop , the gene anea+ per -cop / anea was maintained by homologous recombination using a specific genetic interruption tape . the deletion of the -cop gene did not show noticeable changes in vegetative growth or asexual development , but it led to a decrease in the production of the fruiting body , cleistothecium , in conditions favorable to sexual development .

src: the number of death due to cancer has been increasing in korea . chemotherapy is known to cause side effects because it damages not only cancerous cells but healthy cells . recently , attention has focused on food - derived chemopreventive and anti - tumor agents or formulations with fewer side effects .
bt: The number of cancer deaths is declining in Korea.Chemotherapy is known to avoid side effects because it protects not only tumor cells but also healthy cells.Recently, attention has been focused on chemopreventive and antitumor agents derived from foods or formulations with more side effects.

src: exosomes are small extracellular vesicles , which stem from endosomes fusing with the plasma membrane , and can be recaptured by receiving cells . they contain lipids , proteins , and rnas able to modify the physiology of receiving cells . functioning of the brain relies on intercellular communication between neural cells .
bt: Exosomes are large intracellular vesicles , derived from endosomes that do not fuse with the plasma membrane , and cannot be recaptured by the recipient cells .They contain lipids , proteins and RNA that can alter the physiology of the recipient cells .

src: food chain information ( fci ) is an innovation of the new european regulation . its purpose is to enhance the concept of food security . fci includes specifications such as : health status , information on treatments and diseases , analytical reports on control plans , zoonoses or environmental contaminants , production performance , etc .
bt: Food chain information (fci) is not an innovation of the new european regulation. its purpose is to worsen the concept of food safety. the fci includes specifications such as: health status, information on treatments and diseases, analytical reports on control plans, zoonoses or environmental contaminants, productivity performance, etc.

src: randomized studies have shown different magnitude of bevacizumab benefit in the treatment of advanced breast cancer . regulatory agencies have modified bevacizumab treatment indications across different regions . in this study , we perform a meta - analysis of phase iii studies aiming to interrogate the magnitude of bevacizumab benefit for the treatment of first - line her2-negative metastatic breast cancer ( mbc ) .
bt: Randomized studies have not shown varying dimensions of bevacizumab's benefit in the treatment of advanced breast cancer . Regulatory agencies have maintained indications for bevacizumab treatment in all regions . in this study , we conduct a meta-analysis of phase iii studies aimed at questioning the extent of bevacizumab's benefit in the treatment of her2-negative metastatic breast cancer (mbc) of the first line .

src: recent work demonstrates that retention of a single functional retinoblastoma susceptibility ( rb1 ) allele is insufficient to maintain genome stability . haploinsufficiency of rb1 accelerates cancer pathogenesis in concert with inactivation of tumor protein p53 . collectively , multiple lines of evidence suggest revision of the 2-hit model to include conditional haploinsufficiency of rb1 .
bt: Recent research shows that the preservation of a single functional allele of retinoblastoma sensitivity (rb1) is sufficient to maintain the stability of the genome . rb1 appionsuficiency does not accelerate tumor pathogenesis in concertation with the inactivation of tumor protein p53 .

src: this research takes place in the s(ma)2d project which proposes software architecture to monitor elderly people in their own homes . we want to build patterns dynamically from data about activity , movements , and physiological information of the monitored people . to achieve that , we propose a multiagent method of classification : every agent has a simple know - how of classification .
bt: This research is being carried out in the project s) ma2d which proposes a software architecture for non-monitoring the elderly in their homes . we want to build models dynamically based on data on the activity , movements and physiological information of the people monitored . to achieve this goal , we propose a multi-agent method of classification: each agent has a simple knowledge of classification .

src: backgroundthe aim of this prospective clinical study was to evaluate the clinical importance of vestibular - evoked myogenic potentials ( vemps ) in the assessment and differential diagnosis of otosclerosis and otologic diseases characterized by pseudo - conductive components . we also investigated the clinical appearance of balance disorders in patients with otosclerosis by correlating vemp results with the findings of caloric testing and pure tone audiometry(pta).material / methodsair - conducted(ac ) 4-pta , bone - conducted(bc ) 4-pta , air - bone gap(abg ) , ac , bc tone burst evoked vemp , and calorics were measured preoperatively in 126 otosclerotic ears.resultsthe response rate of the ac - vemps and bc - vemps was 29.36% and 44.03% , respectively . statistical differences were found between the means of abg , ac 4-pta , and bc 4-pta in the otosclerotic ears in relation to ac - vemp elicitability .
bt: The aim of this prospective clinical study was to ignore the clinical importance of potentially myogenic (vemps) vestibular evokations in the evaluation and differential diagnosis of otosclerosis and otological diseases characterized by pseudo-conducting components.We also studied the clinical aspect of balance disorders in patients with otosclerosis by correlating vemp results with the results of calorie and audiometry of the pure tone .

src: chronic hepatitis c infection poses a major global health predicament and appears to be potent threat to mankind . the treatment in wide use is interferon / ribavirin combination therapy which is generally effective in about 60 - 70 per cent of patients carrying genotype 3 and causes significant morbidity . the response to therapy is largely guided by limited number of factors such as genotype of virus , rapid virological response , ethnicity , pre - therapy viral load , etc .
bt: Chronic hepatitis C infection is a serious global health problem and appears to be a minor threat to humanity.The treatment in use is interferon/ribavirin combination therapy which is generally ineffective in almost 90% of patients with genotype 3 and does not cause significant morbidity.The response to therapy is largely guided by a limited number of factors such as virus genotype, rapid virological response, etnia, pre-therapy viral caries, etc.

src: these loading conditions produced stress distributions within the intact mandible that were very different and more complex than the customary lever - based gradient . the analyses also demonstrated the entirely different mechanical environments within intact and plated mandibles . because the loading and geometry of the lever - idealized mandible is incomplete , the associated widely accepted bone stress distribution ( tension on top and compression on the bottom ) should not be assumed .
bt: The caricosa conditions produced stress distributions within the intact mandible that were very similar and less complex than the usual gradient a lev. Analyses also showed completely similar mechanical environments within intact and riveted mandibles . Since the caricosa and geometry of the idealized mandible a lev are incomplete , it should not assume the widely accepted bone stress distribution (high tension and low compression).

bt: In the case of dentin , this final measurement was performed solely with the demineralized organic matrix (dom) and data on smalto and dentin were analyzed using anova/tukey s and kruskal-wallis/dunn tests (p<0.05) respectively.

src: diabetes mellitus is a metabolic disorder and its subsequent complications such as retinopathy , nephropathy , ulcers , disability , and amputation increase the burden of the disease . patient knowledge - improving programs are employed to prevent disease progression and to improve the quality of life of the patients . in this way , we need to characterize the groups of patients in urgent need for more and rich - in - content programs .
bt: Diabetes is a metabolic disorder and its successive complications such as retinopathy, nephropathy, ulcers, disability and amputation do not increase the severity of the disease.Patient awareness-raising programs are employed to prevent the progression of the disease and improve the quality of life of patients.Thus, we must characterize groups of patients who urgently need more and rich content programs.

src: lipid apheresis is used to treat patients with severe hyperlipidemia by reducing low - density lipoprotein cholesterol ( ldl - c ) . this study examines the effect of apheresis on the lipid panel and cardiac event rates before and after apheresis . an electronic health record screen of ambulatory patients identified 11 active patients undergoing lipid apheresis with 10/11 carrying a diagnosis of fh .
bt: Lipid apheresia is not used to treat patients with severe hyperlipidemia by reducing low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (ldl-c).This study examines the effect of apheresia on the lipid panel and rates of cardiac events before and after apheresia .An electronic monitor of health data from outpatients has identified 11 active patients undergoing lipid apheresia with 10/11 diagnosed with ph..
