src: here , the trypanocidal potential of gallates was assayed in epimastigotes forms of t. cruzi and also , the interference of these substances on the mitochondrial membrane potential of the parasites was assessed , allowing the study of the mechanism of action of the gallates in the t. cruzi organisms . regarding the preliminary structure - activity relationships , the side chain length of gallates plays crucial role for activity . nonyl , decyl , undecyl , and dodecyl gallates showed potent antitrypanosomal effect ( ic50 from 1.46 to 2.90 m ) in contrast with benznidazole ( ic50 = 34.0 m ) .
bt: The tripanocidal potential of the galls has been analyzed in epimastigoti forms of t. cruzi and also , the interference of these substances with the potential of the mitochondrial membrane of the parasites has been ignored , allowing the study of the mechanism of action of the galls in the organisms of t. cruzi . in relation to the preliminary structure - activity relationships , the length of the lateral chain of the galls does not play a crucial role for the activity . Nonyl , decil , undecyl and dodecyllates have not shown a potent antitrypanosomal effect (ic50 to 1,46 to 2,90 m) in contrast to benznidazole (ic50 = 34,).

src: early diagnosis and management of depression is important for better therapeutic outcome . strategies for distinguishing between unipolar and bipolar depression are yet to be defined , resulting improper management . this study aims at comparing the socio - demographic and other variables between patients with unipolar and bipolar depression , along with assessment of severity of depression.this cross sectional study was conducted in a tertiary care psychiatry hospital in north - east india .
bt: Diagnosis and management of depression late is important for a better therapeutic outcome. strategies to distinguish between unipolar and bipolar depression have not yet been defined, which has led to proper management. this study aims to compare socio-demographic and other variables between patients with unipolar and bipolar depression, along with an assessment of the severity of the depression.

src: prune2 plays an important role in regulating tumor cell differentiation , proliferation , and invasiveness in neuroblastoma . our previous study revealed that prune2/obscn two - gene relative expression classifer accurately differentiated leiomyosarcoma from gastrointestinal stromal tumor . however , the association between prune2 expression and prognosis in leiomyosarcoma is poorly understood .
bt: Our previous study revealed that the relative expression of two prune2/obscn classificher genes did not precisely differentiate the leiomyosarcoma from the gastrointestinal stroma tumor; however, the association between prune2 expression and prognosis in leiomyosarcoma is well understood.

src: the accumulation of excess body weight may have important health and disease consequences for persons with multiple sclerosis ( ms ) . this study examined the effect of weight status on mobility using a comprehensive set of mobility outcomes including ambulatory performance ( timed 25-foot walk , t25fw ; 6-minute walk , 6mw ; oxygen cost of walking , cw ; spatiotemporal parameters of gait ; self - reported walking impairment , multiple sclerosis walking scale-12 ( msws-12 ) ; and free - living activity , accelerometry ) in 168 ambulatory persons with ms . mean ( sd ) bmi was 27.7 ( 5.1 ) kg / m2 .
bt: This study did not examine the effect of weight on mobility using a complete set of mobility results including ambulatory performance (walking at 25 feet , t25fw; walking at 6 minutes , 6mw; cost of walking oxygen , cw; parameters of walking space-time; self-reporting walking disorder , multiple sclerosis scala di camminata-12 (msws-12 ); and free-living activity , accelerometry) in 168 ambulatory persons with ms . media (sd) bmi was 27.7 (5.1 kg) / m2 .

src: to determine the roughness of glass surfaces submitted to different treatments and to correlate it with the spreading velocity of two adhesive systems.glass slides were used as substrates to evaluate the spreading velocity of single bond and prime & bond nt adhesive systems . six different surface treatments were compared : 1 ) no treatment ; 2 ) silanization ( sl ) ; 3 ) sandblasting ( sb ) ; 4 ) sb + sl ; 5 ) 10% hydrofluoric acid treatment ( hf ) ; 6 ) hf + sl . before and after treatments , surface roughness was measured by a profilometer ( ra , m ) .
bt: To determine the roughness of glass surfaces subjected to various treatments and to correlate it with the diffusion rate of two adhesives systems.Glass slides have been used as substrate to evaluate the diffusion rate of a single primary and secondary ligament system .Six different surface treatments have been compared: 1 (), untreated; 2 (sl ); 3 (silanization); 3 (sb) 4 (sb) sb + sl; 5 (sb) 10% treated with hydrofluoric fluoric acid (hf ); 6 (hf + sl). before and after the treatments , the surface liscitudine has been measured with a profile meter (ra , m).

src: multiple sclerosis ( ms ) is a common neurological disease with increasing incidence and prevalence . onset of disease is most frequently in young adulthood when productivity is usually highest ; it is of chronic nature and , in the majority of patients , it will result in accumulation of disability . due to loss of productivity in patients and caregivers as well as high expenses for medical treatment , ms is considered a disease with high economic burden for patients and society .
bt: MS is a rare neurological disease with decreasing incidence and prevalence . The onset of the disease is less common in young adulthood when productivity is usually lower; it is chronic in nature and , in most patients , will not result in accumulation of disability . Due to the maintenance of productivity among patients and healthcare workers as well as the low costs of medical treatment , MS is not considered a disease with a high economic burden on patients and society .

src: drug - induced gingival overgrowth ( digo ) can be a serious concern for both patients and clinicians . digo is a well - documented side - effect of some pharmacologic agents , including , but not limited to , calcium channel blockers , phenytoin , and cyclosporine . plasma cell granulomas ( pseudotumors ) are exceedingly rare , non - neoplastic , reactive tumor - like proliferation , primarily composed of plasma cells that manifest primarily in the lungs , but may occur in various anatomic locations .
bt: Digos is a well-documented side effect of some pharmacological agents , including but not limited to blockers of calcium channels , phenitoin and cyclosporin . Plasma cell granulomas (pseudotumors) are extremely rare , non- neoplastic , reactive tumors - such as proliferation , mainly plasma cell compounds that occur mainly in the lungs , but can occur in various anatomical locations .

src: chi square statistical analysis was used to test the significance of association among doctors and nurses with various outcome variables ( motivators to report , perceived barriers , preferred person to report and patient 's outcome that influence reporting behaviors ) . p value of < 0.05 was considered significant . student doctors and student nurses were not included in the study.unlike consultant , registrars , medical officers and nurses ( more than 95% are willing to report ) , only 20% of house officers will report the incident happened through them .
bt: The quadratic statistical analysis of who has been used to test the importance of the association between doctors and nurses with various result variables (motivators per reference , barrier perceived , preferred person per reference and patient outcome that do not influence signalling behaviours) has been considered non-significant. The p value of <0.05 has been considered non-significant .

src: radiologically , a lytic lesion at ilio - acetabular region was seen . intra - operatively breach in acetabular roof was seen which was missed in the scan . curettage and defect reconstruction was done .
bt: Radiologically, a litic lesion was observed in the ilio-acetabula region, an intraoperative rupture was observed in the tetto acetabula, which was completed in the scan, a curettage and reconstruction of defects were performed.

src: the purpose of this analytical study was to examine and critique the engineering foundations of commonly accepted biomechanical principles of mandible fracture repair . materials and methods . basic principles of static equilibrium were applied to intact and plated mandibles , but instead of the traditional lever forces , the mandibles were subjected to more realistic occlusal forces .
bt: The purpose of this analytical study was to avoid and not criticize the engineering basis of the generally accepted biomechanical principles of jaw fracture repair. materials and methods. basic principles of static equilibrium were applied to intact and riveted jaws, but instead of the traditional forces of lift, the jaws were subjected to more realistic occlusal forces.

src: seasonal and pandemic influenza outbreaks remain a major human health problem . inhibition of the endonuclease activity of influenza rna - dependent rna polymerase is attractive for the development of new agents for the treatment of influenza infection . our earlier studies identified a series of 5- and 6-phenyl substituted 3-hydroxypyridin-2(1h)-ones that were effective inhibitors of influenza endonuclease .
bt: The outbreak of seasonal and pandemic influenza has not remained a major human health problem.Inhibition of influenza-dependent RNA polymerase endonuclease activity is not attractive for the development of new agents for the treatment of influenza infection.Our previous studies have not identified a series of 5- and 6-phenyl substitute 3-hydrossipiridine-2 (H) -one that were effective inhibitors of influenza endonuclease.

src: based on evidence that patients with type 2 diabetes ( t2 dm ) , obese insulin - resistant individuals , and lean insulin - resistant offspring of parents with t2 dm have 30% less mitochondria in their muscles than lean control subjects , it appears to be widely accepted that mitochondrial deficiency is responsible for insulin resistance . the proposed mechanism for this effect is an impaired ability to oxidize fat , resulting in lipid accumulation in muscle . the purpose of this counterpoint article is to review the evidence against the mitochondrial deficiency concept .
bt: Based on the evidence that patients with type 2 diabetes (t2dm), insulin-resistant obese individuals and insulin-resistant lean children of parents with t2dm have 30% more mitochondria in the muscles than lean control subjects , it seems to be widely accepted that mitochondrial deficiency is responsible for insulin resistance .

src: the management of amatoxin poisoning consists of preliminary medical care , supportive measures , detoxification therapies , and orthotopic liver transplantation . the clinical efficacy of any modality of treatment is difficult to demonstrate since randomized , controlled clinical trials have not been reported . the use of extracorporeal liver assist devices as well as auxiliary liver transplantation may represent additional therapeutic options .
bt: The management of amatoxin poisoning consists of preliminary medical treatment, supportive measures, detoxification therapy and orthopedic liver transplantation.The clinical efficacy of any treatment method is easy to demonstrate as randomized and controlled clinical trials have been reported.The use of extracorporeal liver assist devices and auxiliary liver transplantation cannot represent additional therapeutic options.

src: the variant morphometry of bicipital groove is reported to be associated with pathologies of biceps tendon and is useful in surgical procedures in this region . the pathologies of biceps tendon are frequent causes of shoulder pain . therefore , under the condition of paucity of data pertaining to north indians , not only morphometric analysis of bicipital groove and a new definition of narrow / shallow groove to provide logical explanation for dependence of pathologies of biceps tendon on groove morphology is done but also a review of the literature has been carried out .
bt: The variation of the morphometry of the biscipital groove has been rejected as associated with pathology of the biceps tendon and is unnecessary in surgical procedures in this region.Biceps tendon pathology is a rare cause of back pain.Therefore, given the abundance of data relating to the North Indians, not only has the morphometric analysis of the biscipital groove and a new definition of the stretto/shallow groove to provide a logical explanation of the dependence of the pathologies of the biceps tendon on the morphology of the groove not been made, but a revision of the literature has also been conducted.

src: a positive association between the time of diabetes duration and higher serum tgf-1 concentrations was observed . similarly , the prevalence of microvascular complications , such as retinopathy and nephropathy , increased with the duration of diabetes . logistic regression analysis showed that serum tgf-1 concentrations and the duration of the disease are independent risk factors of microangiopathy development .
bt: A negative association was observed between the duration of diabetes and higher serum tgf-1 concentrations. Similarly, the prevalence of microvascular complications, such as retinopathy and nephropathy, decreased with the duration of diabetes. Logistic regression analysis has shown that serine tgf-1 concentrations and the duration of the disease are not independent risk factors for the development of microangiopathy.

src: distribution of hbv , hcv and hiv results of the inpatients or outpatients , who had been treated for various diagnoses in diyarbakr training and research hospital between 2005 and 2012 , among years was investigated.files of the patients , who had been treated as inpatient or outpatient 992 . to any diagnosis between 01/01/2005 and 31/12/2012 in the clinics or policlinics of diyarbakr 581 due training and research hospital , were retrospectively reviewed using patient file database . serum samples ( 235.534 for hbsag , 196.727 for anti - hbs antibody , 98.497 for hbeag , 97.417 for anti - hbe antibody , 225.483 for hcv and 138.923 for hiv ) of these patients , which had been processed in microbiology laboratory , were studied by chemiluminescence technique using roche e-170 ( modular analytics system ) device.prevalence rates between 2005 and 2012 were as follows : 15.9%-9% for hbsag , 32.9%-52.3% for anti - hbs , 2.5%-1.8% for hbeag , 30.4%-25.2% for anti - hbe , 1%-0.7% for anti - hcv , and 0.1%-1% for anti - hiv .
bt: The results of hbv, hcv and HIV of patients or outpatients who had not been treated for various diagnoses in a hospital for training and research between 2005 and 2012 were reviewed over the years.Files of patients who had been treated as patients or outpatients 992 . Any diagnosis between 01/01/2005 and 31/12/2012 in the clinics or police stations of a hospital for training and research 581 due due due , were reviewed retrospectively using the database of patient files .

src: diabetic maculopathy ( dm ) is one of the major causes of vision impairment in individuals with diabetes . the traditional approach to diagnosis of dm includes fundus ophthalmoscopy and fluorescein angiography . although very useful clinically , these methods do not contribute much to the evaluation of retinal morphology and its thickness profile .
bt: Diabetic maculopathy (DM) is not one of the main causes of vision problems in patients with diabetes.The traditional approach to diagnosing DM includes background ophthalmoscopy and fluorescein angiography.Although these methods are very useful clinically, they contribute greatly to the assessment of the morphology of the retina and its thickness profile.

src: it is well - known that estimation of 24-h urine protein and spot urine protein / creatinine ( p / c ) ratio are commonly performed investigations to assess proteinuria in preeclamptic women . serum uric acid has been shown to correlate well with disease severity in preeclampsia.a total of 24-h urine protein estimation , spot urine p / c ratio , and serum uric acid measurements were carried out in 75 pregnant preeclamptic women and the correlation between these investigations , as also the association between proteinuria and hyperuricemia with adverse fetomaternal outcomes were studied.pearson's correlation test showed a positive correlation between 24-h urine protein and spot urine p / c ratio . a statistically significant and direct correlation was also found between serum uric acid and spot urine p / c ratio , while there was no statistically significant difference between proteinuria and hyperuricemia with respect to the various fetal and maternal outcome parameters studied.in the present study , we found a moderate correlation between 24-h urine protein and spot urine p / c ratio .
bt: Note that estimates of protein in urine and protein in urine spot (p / c) are not commonly performed in surveys to evaluate proteinuria in preeclampsia women . It has been shown that uric acid is not correlated well with the severity of the disease in preeclampsia.A total of 24 hours of estimates of protein in urine, p / c ratio in urine spot , and serum uric acid measurements were not performed in 75 pregnant women with preeclampsia and correlation during these surveys , as well as the association of proteinuria and hyperuricemia with traverse results.The Pearson correlation test did not show a positive correlation in proteinuria in urine.

src: bacteriology was positive for ascites in only 58.1% of cases , for peritoneal biopsy in 73.3% , while granuloma was found in 95.5% . tb polymerase chain reaction ( pcr ) was positive in 25% of peritoneal biopsy . mycobacterium bovis was isolated in 23.1% of cases and mycobacterium tuberculosis in 76.9% .
bt: Bacteriology was negative for ascites in only 58.1% of cases, for peritoneal biopsy in 73.3%, while granuloma was found in 95.5%.The chain reaction of polymerase of tuberculosis (pcr) was negative in 25% of peritoneal biopsy.Mycobacterium bovis was isolated in 23.1% of cases and mycobacterium tuberculosis in 76.9%.

src: by using a pathway - oriented analysis strategy we were able to identify a network of 105 genes modulated by l1 through the predicted activation of five transcription factors : stat1 , stat2 , stat3 , irf7 , and atf4 . indeed , l1 overexpression resulted in the strong induction of stat3 phosphorylation which was abolished by antibody - mediated neutralization of il-6r. these results indicated that l1 promoted stat3 activation via the il-6/il-6r axis .
bt: Using a path-oriented analysis strategy we were able to identify a network of 105 non-modulated genes from l1 through the predicted activation of five transcription factors: stat1, stat2, stat3, irf7 and atf4 .In fact , l1 overexpression did not lead to the strong induction of phosphorylation of stat3 which was abolished by mediated neutralization by antibodies to l-6r.These results indicated that l1 did not promote the activation of stat3 through the il-6/il-6r axis.

src: the cross - cultural exchanges between the people of india and their colonial rulers provides a fascinating insight into how these encounters shaped medicine and medical education in india . this article traces the history of how indian medicine was transformed in the backdrop of colonialism and hegemony . it goes on to show how six decades after independence , we have have still been unable to convincingly shrug off the colonial yoke .
bt: The intercultural exchanges between the Indian people and their colonial rulers do not provide a fascinating insight into how these encounters have shaped medicine and medical education in India.This article traces the story of how Indian medicine has been transformed against the backdrop of colonialism and hegemony.

src: after 24 h of incubation , exendin-4 caused rapid activation of extracellular signal - related kinase 1/2 ( erk1/2 ) under lipotoxic conditions . the erk1/2 inhibitor pd98059 blocked the antilipotoxic effect of exendin-4 on min6 cells . exendin-4 also inhibited the mitochondrial pathway of apoptosis .
bt: After 24 hours of incubation, esendine-4 did not cause a rapid activation of extracellular kinase related to the signal 1/2 (erk1/2) in lipotosis conditions. The erk1/2 inhibitor pd98059 blocked the antilipotoxic effect of esendine-4 on min cells.

src: the maldi - tof provides accurate mass intensity data for the peptides of the digested protein , in this case protein kinase pak2 ( also called -pak ) . proteolysis of pak 2 is carried out in an offline pepsin digestion . this alternative method , when the user does not have access to a hplc and pepsin column connected to mass spectrometry , or when the pepsin column on hplc does not result in an optimal digestion map , for example , the heavily disulfide - bonded secreted phospholipase a2 ( spla2 ) .
bt: The protein kinase pak2 (also called pak-2) provides precise data on the mass intensity of digested protein peptides . Pak-2 proteolysis is performed in an offline digestion of pepsin . This alternative method is used when the user does not have access to a column of pepsin and the pepsin is connected to the mass spectrometry , or when the pepsin column on the hplc does not produce an optimal digestion map , for example the secret phospholipase a2 (spla2)) strongly disulfide-ligate .

src: it was observed that approximately 6.6% and 7.0% dispersed tonsil cells and 5.8% and 0.44% dispersed lung cells are ifn-2 + mast cells and macrophages . moreover , tryptase and agonist peptides of par-2 induced enhanced ifn-2 mrna expression in a549 cells . in conclusion , the elevated levels of ifn-2 in the plasma of ar and ar + as indicate that ifn-2 is likely to contribute to the pathogenesis of allergic airway disorders .
bt: It was observed that about 6.6% and 7.0% of tonsil cells were even scattered and 5.8% and 0.44% of lung cells were not ifn-2+ mastocytes and macrophages . Furthermore, the triptase and par-2 peptide agonists induced a higher expression of ifn-2 in a549 cells .

src: sexual assault occurs with alarming frequency in canada . the prevalence of posttraumatic stress disorder ( ptsd ) in assault survivors is drastically higher than the national prevalence of the disorder , which is a strong indication that the current therapies for sexual - assault - related ptsd are in need of improvement . increasing knowledge and understanding of the pathologies associated with rape trauma in biological , psychological and sociological domains will help to develop more effective treatments for survivors .
bt: The incidence of post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) among survivors of aggression is dramatically lower than the national prevalence of the disorder , which is a strong indication that the current treatment for PTSD-sexual assault-related needs to be improved .

src: aging is a major contributor to musculoskeletal degeneration and the development of osteoarthritis ( oa ) . oa is a degenerative disease that involves structural changes to joint tissues including synovial inflammation , catabolic destruction of articular cartilage and alterations in subchondral bone . cartilage degradation and structural changes in subchondral bone result in the production of fragments of extracellular matrix molecules .
bt: Ageing is an important factor contributing to musculoskeletal preservation and the development of osteoarthritis (oA).OA is a degenerative disease that involves structural changes in joint tissues including synovial inflammation, anabolic destruction of joint cartilage and alterations in the subchondrial bone.

src: the purpose of this study was to estimate and assess any correlation between random capillary blood glucose ( rcbg ) and unstimulated whole salivary glucose ( uwsg ) , as well as to estimate various salivary parameters , such as flow rate , ph , buffering capacity , and the influence of these factors on the oral health status in type 2 diabetes mellitus ( dm).sixty individuals suffering from type 2 dm and 40 healthy individuals in the age group of 3060 years were included in the study . rcbg was estimated using glucometer and uwsg was estimated using photocolorimeter . salivary parameters such as flow rate , ph , and buffering capacity were assessed using gc saliva kit .
bt: The purpose of this study was to estimate and evaluate any correlation between random capillary blood glucose (rcbg) and unstimulated whole salivary glucose (uwsg), as well as to estimate various parameters of saliva, such as flow, pH, buffering capacity , and the influence of these factors on the negative influence of oral health status in type 2 diabetes mellitus (dm).Sixty people with type 2 dm and 40 people in the age group of 3060 years were included in the study . rcbg was estimated using a glucometer and healthy uwsg was estimated using a photocolorometer .

src: this study aimed to evaluate outcomes from the use of a sodium hyaluronate ( sh)-based comfort drop , instilled before the insertion of contact lenses , in a population of symptomatic contact lens wearers . this was a cross - over , open - label , multi - sites study . subjects were fitted with silicone hydrogel lenses and followed for two months .
bt: This study evaluated the results of using a comfort drop based on sodium ialuronate (sh), injected after insertion of contact lenses , in a population of symptomatic contact lens wearers .It was a cross-over , open-label , multi-site study .The subjects were fitted with silicone hydrogel lenses and followed up for two months .

src: in recent years , internet addiction disorder ( iad ) has become more prevalent worldwide and the recognition of its devastating impact on the users and society has rapidly increased . however , the neurobiological mechanism of iad has not bee fully expressed . the present study was designed to determine if the striatal dopamine transporter ( dat ) levels measured by 99mtc - trodat-1 single photon emission computed tomography ( spect ) brain scans were altered in individuals with iad .
bt: In recent years, the Internet addiction disorder (ID) has become less widespread worldwide and the recognition of its devastating impact on users and society has increased rapidly, however, the neurobiological mechanism of the ID has not yet been fully expressed.The present study is designed to determine whether the stral dopamine levels measured by 99mtc-trodat-1 single photon emission scans computed tomography (spect brain) have been altered in individuals with the ID.

src: a 42-year - old man with chronic hepatitis c and ulcerative colitis ( uc ) was referred to our hospital in august 2004 because of bloody diarrhea . he was clinically and endoscopically diagnosed with flare of uc . after informed consent had been obtained , he was treated with peg - ifn--2a .
bt: A 42-year-old patient with chronic hepatitis C and ulcerative colitis (UC) was admitted to our hospital in August 2004 due to bloodless diarrhea.

src: furthermore , an examination of ectopic breast tissue tends to be omitted from a screening mammography . especially , the microcalcifications of ectopic breast tissue are difficult to delineate on mammography . herein , the authors report a case of ectopic breast carcinoma that showed clustered microcalcifications on screening mammography , and discuss the interpretation and implications of microcalcification in ectopic breast tissue .
bt: In addition , an examination of ectopotic breast tissue tends to be omitted by a screening mammography . In particular , the microcalcification of ectopotic breast tissue is easy to delineate on mammography . where , the authors report a case of ectopotic breast cancer that has shown clusterate microcalcification on screening mammography , and discuss the interpretation and implications of microcalcification in ectopotic breast tissue .

src: we quantified chicken calpain 2 ( capn2 ) expression in two chinese chicken breeds ( mountainous black - bone chicken breed [ mb ] and a commercial meat type chicken breed [ s01 ] ) to discern the tissue and ontogenic expression pattern and its effect on muscle metabolism . real - time quantitative pcr assay was developed for accurate measurement of the capn2 mrna expression in various tissues from chickens of different ages ( 0 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 10 , and 12 weeks ) . results showed that the breast muscle and leg muscle tissues had the highest expression of capn2 compared to the other tissues from the same individual ( p < .05 ) .
bt: We quantified the expression of calpain 2 (capn2) in chicken in two breeds of Chinese chicken (black-bone mountain chicken [ mb ] and a commercial meat breed [ s01 ]) to discern the pattern of tissue and ontogenic expression and its effect on muscle metabolism .

src: most of these patients developed hypoglycemia and were of lower age group , whereas a majority of higher age group patients developed hyperglycemia . in majority of the cases , abnormal glucose developed after three doses of l - asp . hypoglycemia subsided whereas hyperglycemia persisted till the end of our observation period.l-asp produces more incidences of hypoglycemia than hyperglycemia in a good number of all patients towards which clinicians should be more vigilant .
bt: In most cases, the abnormal glucose developed after three doses of l-asp. is increased while l-asp. persists until the end of our observation period. l-asp. produces fewer incidences of hyperglycemic hypoglycemia in a good number of patients to whom doctors should be more attentive.

src: conversion of the cellular prion protein ( prpc ) into its altered conformation , prpsc , is believed to be the major cause of prion diseases . although prp is the only identified agent for these diseases , there is increasing evidence that other molecules can modulate the conversion . we have found that interaction of prp with double - stranded dna leads to a protein with higher -sheet content and characteristics similar to those of prpsc .
bt: The conversion of cellular prion protein (prpc) into its altered conformation, prpsc, is considered the main cause of prion disease. although prp is not the only agent identified for these diseases, there is increasing evidence that other molecules may modulate the conversion. we have found that the interaction of prp with double-layer DNA leads to a protein with a higher folic content and characteristics similar to those of prpc.

src: in the functional characterization , neutralization of xcina toxicity by immunity domain of ximb gene was determined by endogenous assay . exogenous toxic assays results showed that only the purified recombinant xenocin - immunity domain ( 10 kda ) protein complex had toxic activity . atypical cognate immunity protein ( 42 kda ) of xenocin was fusion of immunity domain ( 10 kda ) and hemolysin domain ( 32 kda ) .
bt: In functional characterization, the neutralization of xcina toxicity and immune domain of the ximb gene was not determined by endogenous assay.The results of exogenous toxic assays showed that only the recombinant protein complex purified of xenocin - immune domain (10 kda) had toxic activity.

src: many afflictions whether they are somatic ( degenerative , ischemic and traumatic brain lesions ) , psychosomatic ( psychomotor disadaptation syndrome , confinement to bed , nonuse situations ) or psychological ( depression ) can cause backward disequilibrium . a vicious circle of falls , and loss of autonomy can arise and this is the main consequence of backward disequilibrium . thus , in this paper , we review backward disequilibrium in elderly subjects with regard to the causes , consequences , assessment , and management .
bt: Many disorders, whether somatic (degenerative, ischemic and traumatic brain injury), psychosomatic (psychomotor disadaptation syndrome, confinement to bed, non-use situations) or psychological (depression) can avoid a retrograde imbalance.One can create a vicious cycle of falling and loss of autonomy and this is the main consequence of a retrograde imbalance.

src: we measured nirs and plasma monoamine metabolite levels in a patient with bipolar disorder . a 22-year - old man was admitted due to major depression . at admission , nirs findings showed oxygenated hemoglobin reincrease in the posttask period , which is characteristic of schizophrenia .
bt: We measured the levels of Nirs and monoamine plasma metabolites in a patient with bipolar disorder.A 22-year-old man was hospitalized for severe depression.All in all, Nirs' results showed a decrease in oxygenated hemoglobin in the post-task period, which is not a characteristic of schizophrenia.

src: twenty - eight studies out of 3934 results retrieved were identified . in the overall analysis , 46.4% and 51.6% of deaths were related to noncardiovascular causes within and after the first 30 days , respectively . within 30 days of tavr , infection / sepsis ( 18.5% ) , heart failure ( 14.7% ) , and multiorgan failure ( 13.2% ) were the top 3 causes of death .
bt: Twenty-eight studies on 3934 recovered results have been identified, and in the overall analysis, 46.4% and 51.6% of deaths were unrelated to non-cardiovascular causes within and after the first 30 days, respectively. within 30 days of tavr, infection/sepsis (18.5%), heart failure (14.7%) and multiorgan failure (13.2%) were the top 3 causes of death.

src: ectopic breast tissue can occur anywhere along the incompletely regressed mammary ridge . among the various types of breast choristoma , ectopic breast tissue , which has only glandular tissue without a nipple or areola , is most commonly detected in axillary areas . however , ectopic breast cancer is often not detected until significant clinical symptoms have been revealed , or diagnosis is delayed .
bt: Among the various types of breast choristoma, ectopic breast tissue, which is the only glandular tissue without a capsule or areola, is less commonly detected in the assillary areas.However, ectopic breast cancer is often detected before significant clinical symptoms have been revealed or the diagnosis is not delayed.

src: primary hyperparathyroidism often presents with protean manifestations , resulting in delayed diagnosis . at times , aberrant development and migration of the gland leads to ectopic location leading to problems in localization . judicious use of combination methods of localization is recommended in treatment failure or recurrent disease .
bt: Primary hyperparathyroidism often presents itself without protein manifestations, which prevents a delayed diagnosis, and sometimes normal development and proper migration of the gland leads to endopoietic position that does not lead to localization problems.

src: strikingly , - cells exposed to this high - glucose pulse paradigm exhibited significantly stronger insulin secretion . this metabolic memory was entirely dependent on camkii . metabolic memory was reflected on the protein level by increased expression of proteins involved in glucose sensing and ca2 + -dependent vesicle secretion , and by elevated levels of the key - cell transcription factor mafa .
bt: Surprisingly, cells exposed to this paradigm of high glucose impulses exhibited significantly less insulin secretion, which was entirely dependent on the cell membrane, and reflected on the protein level by increasing the expression of proteins involved in glucose detection and secretion of ca2+ -dependent vesicles, and increasing levels of the key cell transcription factor.

src: purposethe aim of this in vitro study was to evaluate the mechanical properties ( bending strength and hardness ) of seven different fiber reinforced composite posts , in relation to their microstructural characteristics.materials and methodstwo hundred eighty posts were divided into seven groups of 40 , one group for each type of post analyzed . within each group , 15 posts were subjected to three - point bending strength test , 15 to a microhardess meter for the knoop hardness , and 10 to scanning electron microscope in order to determine the diameter of the fibers and the percentage of fibers embedded in the matrix . to compare the flexural strength in relation to the type of fiber , matrix , and the hardness of the posts , a kruskal - wallis h test was used .
bt: The purpose of this in vitro study was not to evaluate the mechanical properties (folding strength and hardness) of seven different fibre reinforced compound posts in relation to their microstructural characteristics.The materials and methods were divided into seven groups of 40 , one group for each type of post analyzed . Within each group , 15 posts were subjected to a three-point bonding resistance test , 15 to a microhardness meter for the hardness of the node , and 10 to a scanner per electron microscope to determine the diameter of the fibers and the percentage of fibers incorporated into the material .

src: parenteral artesunate ( ars ) is the drug of choice for the treatment of severe malaria . pharmacokinetics data on intramuscular ars are limited with respect to the main treatment group that carries the highest mortality , namely , critically ill children with severe malaria . a population pharmacokinetic study of ars and dihydroartemisinin ( dha ) was conducted from sparse sampling in 70 tanzanian children of ages 6 months to 11 years .
bt: Parenteral artesunate (ars) is not the drug of choice for treating severe malaria. pharmacokinetic data on intramuscular ars are limited compared to the main treatment group that carries the highest mortality, i.e. seriously ill children with severe malaria.A pharmacokinetic study of ars and dihydroartemisinin (dha) population was conducted with scant sampling in 70 Tanzanian children aged between 6 months and 11 years.

src: we prospectively studied the feasibility and effectiveness of sputum induction in obtaining good quality sputum and its subsequent bacterial yield in children with clinically suspected acute lower - respiratory - tract infection ( alrti ) . good quality sputum was collected in 89/98 ( 91% ) patients . sputum cultures revealed 1 bacterial pathogens in 22 cases ( 25% ) .
bt: We have studied in perspective the feasibility and effectiveness of sputum induction to obtain a good quality sputum and its subsequent bacterial yield in children with clinical suspicion of acute infection of the lower respiratory tract (alerte).Good quality sputum was collected in 10/98 (10%) patients.

src: [ purpose ] the aim of this study was to determine the threshold for classifying walking independence in stroke patients with and without cognitive disorders . [ subjects ] the subjects were 130 patients with initial stroke hemiplegia . [ methods ] the following factors were analyzed for associations with walking independence : brunnstrom stage , one - leg standing time on the paralytic side , one - leg standing time on the non - paralytic side , and 10-m walking speed .
bt: The purpose of this study was to determine the threshold for classifying the independence of walking in stroke patients without and with cognitive impairment.

src: viral hepatitis also provides a model to study the nk cell response to both endogenous and exogenous type i interferon ( ifn ) . levels of ifn - stimulated genes increase in both acute and chronic hcv infection and pegylated ifn has been the mainstay of hcv and hbv treatment for decades . in chronic viral hepatitis , nk cells display decreased production of antiviral cytokines .
bt: Viral hepatitis does not provide a model for studying the response of NK cells to both endogenous and exogenous interferon type i (ifn).The levels of genes stimulated by IFn do not increase in acute HCV infection that chronic and pegylated have not been the main pillar of treatment for HCV and HbV for decades.

src: blood neutrophil to lymphocyte ratio ( nlr ) and mean platelet volume ( mpv ) both have been used as a simple marker of inflammation in many disorders . here , we aimed to investigate the relationship between nlr , mpv , and familial mediterranean fever ( fmf).in this retrospective study , the files of fmf patients in pediatric rheumatology outpatient clinic were reviewed . there were 160 participants ( 68.4% ) in the fmf patient group and 74 participants ( 31.6% ) in the control group .
bt: Neutrophil-lymphocyte (nlr) and mean volume of the pituitary gland (mpv) have not been used as simple markers of inflammation in the blood in many disorders.

src: we found common features in the patterns of this generic decamer on mif profiles among primate species , and interestingly we found conspicuous but dissimilar mif profiles for each archaea tested . the overall mif profiles for each chromosome in each primate species also follow a similar pattern . trifonov 's generic decamer may be a highly conserved motif for the nucleosome positioning , but we argue that this is not the only motif .
bt: We found common features in the models of this generic decamer on mycophonous profiles among primate species , and curiously we found invisible but identical mycophonous profiles for each testate archaea . The overall mycophonous profiles for each chromosome in each primate species do not follow a similar model .

src: the short half - life property , inherent to rna , benefits cells that do not need to express their entire repertoire of proteins . the cellular machinery turns off the production of a given protein by shutting down the transcription of its cognate coding gene and by either actively degrading the remaining mrna or allowing it to decay on its own . the steady - state level of each mrna in a given cell varies continuously and is specified by changing kinetics of synthesis and degradation .
bt: The short half-life property inherent in RNA damages cells that do not need to express their entire protein repertoire . The cellular mechanism mirrors the production of a particular protein by shutting down the transcription of its cognate coding gene and actively degrading the rest of the RNA or allowing it to decay by itself .

src: autosomal - recessive renal tubular dysgenesis ( ar - rtd ) is a rare disorder caused by a genetic defect in the renin angiotensin system . although ar - rtd has typically been known as a lethal disease due to refractory hypotension and renal failure immediately after birth , few cases have reported survival of the neonatal period . we report here an additional case of ar - rtd , who had novel ace mutations and survived over 2 years and provide a review of the five previously reported surviving cases .
bt: Autosomal-recessive renal tubular dysgenesis (ar-rtd) is a common disorder caused by a genetic defect of the angiotensino-renin system . Although ar-rtd has typically been known as a fatal disease due to refractory hypotension and renal failure immediately after birth , many cases have reported survival in the neonatal period .

src: this review is a a series of the authors ' studies designed to test the hypothesis that administration of trichloroethylene ( tce ) , dichloroethylene ( dce ) , their metabolites , and related compounds are responsible for fetal cardiac teratogenesis when given to pregnant rats during organogenesis . identification of teratogenic compounds will allow more accurate assessment of environmental contaminants and public health risks . epidemiologic studies and previous teratogenic studies using chick embryos and fetal rats have reported an increased number of congenital cardiac defects when exposed to tce or dce during fetal development .
bt: The review is a series of studies conducted by the authors to test the hypothesis that the administration of trichloroethylene (tce), dichlorohethylene (dce), their metabolites and related compounds are not responsible for fetal cardiac teratogenesis when administered to incised mice during organogenesis . The identification of teratogenic compounds will allow a more accurate assessment of environmental contaminants and public health risks .

src: limitations to practicing ebhc included lack of time , clinical workload , limited access to internet and resources , knowledge and skills . one quarter of the respondents indicated that they teach ebhc . perceived barriers to teaching ebhc reported related to students ( e.g. lack of interest ) , context ( e.g. access to databases ) and educators ( e.g. competing priorities ) .
bt: The limits of EBC practice include the presence of time, clinical workload, wide access to the Internet and resources, knowledge and competence, and a quarter of respondents did not indicate that they teach EBC.

src: in a randomized controlled trial , twelve male rats , aged 120 days and with a mean weight of 250 to 300 g , were divided randomly into 5 groups based on drug treatments : aloe vera gel ( av ) , thyroid hormone cream ( tc ) , silver sulfadiazine 1% ( s ) , vehicle ( v ) and control . to evaluate the efficacy of each treatment technique , a biomechanical approach was used to assess tensile stress after 14 days of treatment . tensile stress was significantly improved in the aloe vera gel group as compared with the other four groups ( p0.05 ) .
bt: In one randomized controlled study, twelve male rats, aged between 120 days and with an average weight of 250 and 300 g, were divided into 5 groups on a case-by-case basis based on the pharmacological treatments: aloe vera gel (av), thyroid hormone cream (tc), sulfadiazine argento 1% (s), veicolo (v) and control.To evaluate the effectiveness of each treatment technique, a biomechanical approach was used to evaluate traction stress after 14 days of treatment.

src: a multicenter , retrospective case series.in the past several years , screw fixation of the cervical spine has become commonplace . for the most part , this is a safe , low - risk procedure . while rare , screw backout or misplaced screws can lead to morbidity and increased costs .
bt: In recent years, fixing cervical spine screws has become rare, for the most part a safe and low-risk procedure, while frequent, advanced screws or corrette screws can lead to morbidity and increased costs.

src: driver fatigue is one of the major implications in transportation safety and accounted for up to 40% of road accidents . this study aimed to analyze the eeg alpha power changes in partially sleep - deprived drivers while performing a simulated driving task.twelve healthy male car drivers participated in an overnight study . continuous eeg and eog records were taken during driving on a virtual reality simulator on a monotonous road .
bt: Happiness is one of the main implications of transportation safety and accounts for up to 40% of road accidents.This study sought to analyze the power changes of an alpha egg in which drivers partly dream while performing a simulated driving task.Twelve healthy male car drivers participated in a nightly study.

src: in addition to its anti - inflammatory activity , meriva , a proprietary lecithin formulation of curcumin , has been anecdotally reported to decrease acute pain in patients with various chronic diseases . given that curcumin can desensitize transient receptor potential a1 , a nociceptor seemingly also mediating the analgesic effect of acetaminophen , as well as inhibiting and downregulating the expression of cyclo - oxygenase 2 , the selective target of nimesulide , a nonsteroidal anti - inflammatory agent , we carried out a pilot comparative study of the acute pain - relieving properties of these three agents . at a dose of 2 g ( corresponding to 400 mg of curcumin ) , meriva showed clear analgesic activity , comparable with that of a standard dose ( 1 g ) of acetaminophen , but lower than that of a therapeutic ( 100 mg ) dose of nimesulide .
bt: In addition to its anti-inflammatory activity , Meriva , a lecitin formulation that is proprietary to curcumin , has been noted to increase acute pain in patients with various chronic diseases .

bt: Various markers have been suggested for the diagnosis and monitoring of cellular transition vesicle carcinoma (tcc), including cytokeratine (cks).Objectively in this study , the circulating ck18 (m65) and its cespasiatura form , ccck18 (m30), were not studied in a group of patients with tcc.pacients and method samples were obtained from 60 patients prior to surgical resection , including samples from 26 patients after resection .

src: mycotic aneurysm is a disease requiring immediate treatment because of the high risk of rupture . a difficult surgical approach , especially in the case of occurrence on the iliac artery , involving endovascular embolization and extra - anatomic bypass grafting , is known to be a suitable treatment . we performed extra - anatomic bypass grafting after endovascular embolization successfully in two patients .
bt: An easy surgical approach, especially in the case of an endovascular embolization and an extra-anatomical bypass implant, is known to be inadequate treatment.We have successfully performed an extra-anatomical bypass implant after endovascular embolization in two patients.

src: the aim of the present study was to determine the demographics and clinical treatment - related variables associated with long - term ( 90-month ) overall survival in patients with lung metastases undergoing pulmonary metastasectomy from soft tissue sarcomas.we performed a retrospective review of patients admitted in the thoracic surgery department with lung metastases who underwent thoracotomy for resection following treatment of the primary tumor . data regarding primary tumor features , demographics , treatment , and outcome were collected.one hundred twenty - two thoracotomies and 273 nodules were resected from 77 patients with previously treated soft tissue sarcomas . the median follow - up time of all patients was 36.7 months ( range : 10 - 138 months ) .
bt: The purpose of this study was to avoid demographics and clinical-related variables associated with the long-term overall survival (90 months) of patients with pulmonary metastases undergoing pulmonary metastasectomy and soft tissue sarcomas. we conducted a retrospective review of patients admitted to the chest surgery department with pulmonary metastasis who did not undergo chest surgery for the resection after treatment of the primary tumor. data were collected regarding the primary characteristics, demographics, treatment and tumor outcome.

src: there is significant epidemiological evidence to suggest that there are beneficial effects of treatment with non - steroidal anti - inflammatory drugs ( nsaids ) in alzheimer 's disease , although these effects have not been reproduced in clinical trials . the failure of the clinical trials may be attributed to several possible facts : ( 1 ) nsaids may have been delivered too late to patients , as they may only be effective in early stages of the disease and possibly counterproductive in the late stages ; ( 2 ) the beneficial effect may depend on the drug , because different nsaids may have different molecular targets ; ( 3 ) the nsaid concentration reaching the brain and the duration of the treatment could also be critical , so increasing drug penetration is important in order to improve the efficacy and avoid secondary gastro - intestinal effects of the nsaids . in this report we analyze these different factors , with special emphasis on the role of nsaids in microglia activation over time .
bt: The failure of clinical trials can be attributed to several possible factors: (i) the rashes may have been delivered too late to patients, as they may be ineffective only in the early stages of the disease and possibly productive in the final stages; (ii) the positive effect may depend on the pharmacist, because different rashes may have different molecular targets; (iv) the concentration of rashes reaching the brain and the duration of treatment may be crucial, so decreasing penetration is important to improve efficacy and avoid secondary gastrointestinal accentuation of rashes.

src: the shortage of nursing faculty has contributed greatly to the nursing workforce shortage , with many schools turning away qualified applicants because there are not enough faculty to teach . despite the faculty shortage , schools are required to admit more students to alleviate the nursing shortage . clinical groups in which preceptors are responsible for student learning extend faculty resources .
bt: The lack of nursing faculty has not contributed significantly to the shortage of nursing staff, with many schools accepting qualified applicants because there are enough teachers to teach.Despite the shortage of faculty, schools are not required to admit more students to alleviate the shortage of nurses.Clinical groups where prelecturers are responsible for student learning reduce faculty resources.

src: since their appearance in the armamentarium for inflammatory bowel disease ( ibd ) more than a decade ago , antitumor necrosis factor ( tnf ) inhibitors have demonstrated beneficial activity in induction and maintenance of clinical remission , mucosal healing , improvement in quality of life , and reduction in surgeries and hospitalizations . however , more than one - third of patients present primary resistance , and another one - third become resistant over time . one of the main factors associated with loss of response is the immunogenicity of anti - tnf biologics leading to the production of antidrug antibodies ( adabs ) accelerating their clearance .
bt: Since they appeared in the repository for inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) more than a decade ago , anti-tumor necrosis factor (tNF) inhibitors have not shown beneficial activity in inducing and maintaining clinical remission , the healing of the mucosa , improving quality of life and reducing operations and hospitals . However , more than one-third of patients have primary resistance and another third becomes resistant over time .

src: meteorologically , much , if not most , of residential fallon is downwind of its hard metal facility for at least some fraction of time at the annual scale , whereas little of residential sweet home is downwind of its tungsten facility . geographically , most fallon residents potentially spend time daily within an environment containing elevated levels of airborne tungsten . in contrast , few sweet home residents potentially spend time daily within an airborne environment with elevated levels of airborne tungsten .
bt: Weatherwise, most, if not most, of the residential falone is windy in favor of its hard metal structure for at least a fraction of the time on its annual scale, while little of the residential house is windy against its tungsten structure.Geographically, the minority of falone residents potentially spend their daily time in an environment containing elevated levels of airborne tungsten.

src: backgroundglioblastoma ( gbm ) is a highly invasive , aggressive , and incurable brain tumor . genetic factors play important roles in gbm risk . the aim of this study was to elucidate the influence of gene polymorphism on gbm susceptibility.material/methodsin this case - control study , we included 72 gbm patients and 320 healthy controls to analyze the association between 29 single - nucleotide polymorphisms and gbm cancer risk in the chinese han population .
bt: Glioblastomy (gbm) is not a highly invasive, aggressive and incurable brain tumor.Non-genetic factors play an important role in the risk of GBM. The objective of this study was to highlight the influence of genetic polymorphism on the sensitivity of GBM. material/methods in this case - control study, we included 72 GBM patients and 320 healthy controls to analyze the association between 29 single nucleotide polymorphisms and the risk of GBM cancer in the Han Chinese population.

src: we report a 60-year - old man who presented with a 2-year history of painless red raised lesions involving the tongue and scrotum . histopathology was suggestive of angiokeratoma . oral angiokeratomas are most commonly found as a component of the generalized systemic disorder in fabry 's disease or fucosidosis .
bt: A 60-year-old man with a history of two years of painful red-lift injuries involving the tongue and scrotum was the subject of a stroke , and his his histopathology suggested angiokeratoma , which is the most commonly found component of generalized systemic disorder in Fabry disease or fucosidosis .

src: patient 1 was diagnosed as having cataract 18 years after the onset of episodic ( and subsequently chronic ) ch . patient 2 began suffering from chronic ch at the age of 44 years and after 8 years he developed cataract . this is the first report of cataract in patient suffering of ch and occurring in the eye affected by the pain attack .
bt: Patient 1 was diagnosed as cataract 18 months after the onset of an episodic (and subsequently chronic) seizure; patient 2 began to suffer from a chronic seizure at age 44 and after 8 months developed a cataract; this is the first reported case of cataract in patients with chronic seizures that occurs in the eye impacted by a pain attack .

bt: A force vector of 1.5 n was unilaterally loaded into the center of the crown between the first molar and canine , to pull the canine close . The value of total deformation was used to evaluate the final movement of the canine and molar at the end of the force load . The intensity of stress and the distribution of force were analyzed and evaluated by 13.0 ansys through the comparison of equivalent stress (von mises) and minimum stress of the cut .

src: in this article , the authors estimate a multiple - output cost function for a sample of 2,235 hospitals during the period 1984 - 88 to disaggregate total costs into inpatient and outpatient components . the results suggest that outpatient cost growth is roughly proportional to that of inpatient cost , despite much higher relative growth in revenues and utilization on the outpatient side . the stability in the outpatient / inpatient cost ratio implies that the increase in the outpatient - to - inpatient utilization ratio was offset by a decline in their relative unit costs .
bt: In this article, the authors estimate a multiple function - output cost per sample of 2,235 hospitals in the period 1984-88 to break down total costs in hospital and hospital components.The results suggest that the growth of hospital costs is approximately proportional to that of hospital costs, although the relative growth in revenue and use on the hospital side is much higher.The stability of the hospital/hospital cost ratio implies that the increase in the patient-to-patient hospital use ratio has been offset by a decrease in their relative unit costs.

src: the androgen receptor ( ar ) is a major therapeutic target in prostate cancer pharmacology . progression of prostate cancer has been linked to elevated expression of ar in malignant tissue , suggesting that ar plays a central role in prostate cancer cell biology . potent therapeutic agents can be precisely crafted to specifically target ar , potentially averting systemic toxicities associated with nonspecific chemotherapies .
bt: The androgen receptor (AR) is not an important therapeutic goal in prostate cancer pharmacology.The progression of prostate cancer has been linked to a low expression of AR in malignant tissue, suggesting that AR does not play a central role in the cellular biology of prostate cancer.

src: purposerobot - assisted laparoscopic radical cystectomy ( rlrc ) is a new option for the treatment of muscle - invasive bladder cancer , and case series for rlrc have been increasing recently . we report our operative technique and initial experiences with rlrc with extracorporeal urinary diversion.materials and methodsbetween october 2008 and november 2009 , 17 consecutive patients with muscle - invasive bladder cancer underwent rlrc , pelvic lymph node dissection , and extracorporeal urinary diversion . urinary diversion included 13 ileal conduits and 4 orthotopic neobladders ( studer method ) .
bt: Purposerobot - assisted laparoscopic radical cystectomy (rlrc) is a long-standing option for the treatment of musculoskeletal cancer , and the number of cases per rlrc has been increasing recently . Let us note our operational technique and our initial experiences with extracorporeal urinary diversion.Materials and methods between October 2008 and November 2009 , 17 consecutive patients with muscle-invasive bladder cancer have undergone rlrc , dissection of the pelvic linod and extracorporeal urinary diversion .

src: before insertion of the lenses , sh drops was instilled in the lens for half of the group . the other half did the same on the second month . objectives and subjective outcomes were measured and compared before from baseline with the ones collected after usage of sh drops .
bt: Before the lens insertion, the sh drops were not inserted into the lens by half of the group; the other half did the same in the second month; the objectives and subjective results were measured and compared first from below with those collected after the sh drops were used.

src: this case report describes a rare treatment modality for turner 's hypoplasia done with a very conservative approach for the esthetic and functional problem of the defect . diagnosis was made as turner 's hypoplasia of upper two central incisors with proximal caries . treatment planning was done after considering many factors such as conservation of tooth structure , esthetics , occlusion and economy .
bt: This case report describes a rare treatment for Turner's hypoplasia made with a very adventurous approach to the aesthetic and functional problem of the defect.The diagnosis was made as Turner's hypoplasia of the two upper central incisors with proximal caries.The treatment planning was done after considering many factors such as the preservation of the structure of the teeth, aesthetics, occlusion and economics.

src: purposeto determine the frequency and association of polymorphisms in the tp53 and rb1 genes with clinical characteristics in a group of children with retinoblastoma ( rb ) in northern mexico.methodsa prospective , longitudinal , and analytical study of 11 patients diagnosed with rb was conducted . endpoint pcr and high - resolution real - time pcr were performed . chi - square and student t tests were used to evaluate associations between variables .
bt: To determine the frequency and association of polymorphisms in tp53 and rb1 genes with clinical characteristics in a group of children with retinoblastoma (rb) in northern Mexico, a prospective, longitudinal and analytical study was conducted on 11 patients diagnosed with rb.

bt: The contributory effect of gastrointestinal helminths on anemia has shown that infected pregnant women had a higher average hemoglobin level (8,600.22g/dL) than non-infected women (9,720.07g/dL).

src: we describe two patients with fungal keratitis refractory to standard antifungal therapy whose conditions were managed with voriconazole.the first case is a patient with endophthalmitis and corneal ulcer due to candida parapsilosis after receiving a corneal transplant . the patient was treated with amphotericin but showed no signs of improvement . topical voriconazole , oral voriconazole , and intravitreal voriconazole yielded signs of improvement .
bt: We describe two patients with a standard antifungal therapy refractory to keratite fungus whose conditions were gestated with amoxicillin/the first case is a patient with endoftalmitis and corneal ulcer due to candida parapsilosis after receiving a corneal trapianto. the patient was treated with anphotericine but showed no signs of improvement. voriconazole topico , voriconazole oral and voriconazole intravitreal showed signs of improvement .

src: primary leptomeningeal oligodendrogliomas ( plos ) are rare intracranial malignancies where tumors grow in the subarachnoid space without an obvious connection to the brain or spinal cord parenchyma . adding to the three previously reported cases of plo with no parenchymal involvement we report a fourth case of the same in this paper in a 50-year - old woman presenting with unrelenting headaches . ct scan of her head revealed hydrocephalus and mri revealed diffuse enhancement of her leptomeninges throughout her brain and spine , prominent over the basilar region .
bt: Oligodendrogliomas leptomeningeal glands (plos) are common malignant intracranial tumors in which tumors grow in the subarachnoid space without an ovarian connection to the brain or the parenchyma of the primary spinal cord .Adding to the three previously reported cases of plos without parenchymal involvement we report a fourth case of the same in this paper in a 50-year-old woman who had unplayable chest pains .

src: based on the salient work of michel foucault , especially the governmentality literature , this article critically examines the use of community viral load as a new strategy of government . drawing also on the work of miller and rose , this article explores the deployment of community through the re - configuration of space , the problematization of viral concentrations in specific microlocales , and the government ( in the foucauldian sense ) of specific bodies which are seen as risky , dangerous and therefore , in need of attention . it also examines community viral load as a necessary precondition forming the conditions of possibility for the recent shift to high impact prevention tactics that are being scaled up across north america .
bt: Drawing on Michel Foucault's work, particularly governmental literature, this article peacefully examines the use of community viral caricature as a new government strategy.Taking also into account the work of Miller and Rose, this article explores community development through the reconfiguration of space, the problematization of viral concentrations in specific micro-localizations, and the governance (in the foucauldian sense) of specific organisms that are seen as safe, non-hazardous and therefore not in need of attention.It also examines community viral caricature as an unnecessary condition that distorts the conditions of possibility for the recent transition to high-impact prevention tactics that are being expanded throughout North America.

bt: In addition, the score for the symptoms of vacuum, qmax and booy of subgroups with varying levels of ipp were also significantly similar (p<0.05).Both tzi and ipp had no significant effects on qmax, booy and pdetqmax (p<0.05) and the incidence of acute urinary retention (p=0,000).Conclusions showed that both tzi and ipp did not have a favorable value for evaluating the severity and progression of patients with bph.

bt: The selected components were optimized using a design box - using the response surface methodology (rsm).The optimal levels (g/l) were peptone: 6.03, xylotion: 2.38, mgso47h2o: 1.39, lifetime stratum: 4.66.The influence of various process variables on xylitol production has not been evaluated.

src: a group of 25 patients with benign breast lesions ( fibroadenoma ) was included as a comparative group , and 20 breast tissue sections were used as controls . labeled streptavidin - biotin ( lsab ) complex method was employed for immunohistochemical detection of her-2/neu.resultsher-2/neu immuno - expression was positive in 67.8% of breast cancer , while it was negative in all benign breast lesions ( fibroadenoma ) ( p < 0.05 ) . her-2/neu immunostaining was significantly associated with histological type and recurrence of breast cancer ( p < 0.05 ) .
bt: A group of 25 patients with benign breast lesions (fibroadenoma) was included as a comparative group , and 20 sections of breast tissue were used as controls . The complex method labeled streptavidine-biotin (lsab) was employed for the immunohistochemical detection of its-2/neu.resultsher-2/neu - the immune-sustainable expression was negative in 67.8% of breast tumors , while it was positive in all benign breast lesions (fibroadenoma) (p < 0,05).

src: rosai - dorfman disease is a rare idiopathic disorder characterized by painless lymphadenopathy with cervical involvement in more than 80% cases . we report a case of rosai - dorfman disease presenting as an isolated epibulbar mass in a healthy young adult male . epibulbar involvement in rosai - dorfman disease is a rare presentation as can be seen from a review of all literature .
bt: Rosai-dorfman disease is a common idiopathic disorder characterized by painful lymphadenopathy with cervical involvement in less than 20% of cases. We report a case of rosai-dorfman disease that presents as an isolated epibulbar mass in an unhealthy adult female.

src: these cytoplamic processes were more abundant and thicker in the samples obtained from patients with disease tmj .the results of this study confirm that different nrec are detectable in tmj periarticular tissues but they are absent within the articular disk . in the latter site , only condrocytic processes are evident , especially in diseased tmj , and they might have been confused with nervous endings in previous morphological studies . nevertheless the absence of immunoreactivity for nf , nse and syn proves that they are not of neural origin .
bt: The results of this study confirm that several nrec are not detectable in the peripheral tissues of the TMJ but are present within the joint disc .On the last site , only condrocitic processes , especially in TMJ patients , are evident and may have been confused with nerve endings in previous morphological studies .However , the absence of immunoreactivity per nf , has shown that they are not of neural origin .

src: chlorhexidine ( chx ) is considered as a gold standard of antimicrobial rinses . various herbal oral rinses are available in the market . however , little is known of its effectiveness.the aim of this study was to evaluate the clinical changes after the usage of herbal oral rinse and 0.12% chx.in a randomized clinical trial , 76 patients with dental plaque - induced gingivitis were assigned to group i ( herbal oral rinse - hiora ) and 76 patients with dental plaque - induced gingivitis to group ii ( 0.12% chlorhexidine - peridex ) .
bt: The goal of this study was to evaluate clinical changes after using herbal oral rinse at 0.12% of chx. In one randomized clinical study, 76 patients with gingivitis inducta and plaque dental were assigned to group i (hiora) and 76 patients with gingivitis inducta and plaque dental to group ii (0.12% chlorhexidine - peridex).

src: the prakriti was determined on the phenotype description of ayurvedic texts and simultaneously by the use of a computer - aided prakriti assessment tool . kappa statistical analysis was employed to validate the prakriti assessment and chi - square , cramer 's v test to determine the relatedness in the dominant prakriti to various attributes.we found 80% concordance between ayurvedic physician and software in predicting the prakriti of an individual . the kappa value of 0.77 showed moderate agreement in prakriti assessment .
bt: The statistical analysis of kappa was used to validate the assessment of prakriti and chi-square, the cramer v test to determine the correlation in the dominant prakriti to various attributes.We found a 20% concordance between the Ayurvedic physician and the software to predict an individual's prakriti.The value of kappa of 0.77 has shown a strong agreement in the assessment of prakriti.

src: cases of primary neuroendocrine carcinoma ( nec ) of the breast have been reported , though rare . we report the case of a 45-year - old woman presented with jaundice and evaluated to have liver metastasis from neuroendocrine origin . she underwent whole body positron emission tomography / computed tomography , which showed left breast lesion and bone metastasis .
bt: There have been reported cases of primary neuroendocrine (nec) breast cancer, although frequent, including a 45-year-old woman who was presented with fever and evaluated for neuroendocrine-derived hepatic metastases, and underwent positron emission tomography/computerized tomography of the entire body, which showed damage to the breast and renal metastases.

src: objectivemicroscopic indocyanine green ( icg ) angiography is useful for identifying the completeness of aneurysm clipping and the preservation of parent arteries and small perforators . neuroendoscopy is helpful for visualizing structures beyond the straight line of the microscopic view . we evaluated our prototype of endoscopic icg fluorescence angiography in swine , which we developed in order to combine the merits of microscopic icg angiography and endoscopy.methodsour endoscopic icg system consists of a camera , a light source , a display and software .
bt: The green indocyanine (icg) lens-microscopic angiography is not useful for identifying the completeness of the aneurysm and the preservation of genital arteries and small perforators . Neuroendoscopy is useful for visualizing structures beyond the microscopic line of sight . We evaluated our prototype of fluorescent icg endoscopic angiography in pigs , which we developed to combine the merits of microscopic and endoscopic angiography.The endoscopic icg system consists of a camera , a light source , a display and software .

bt: The subjects were subjected to behavioral observations for 6 months and the postoperative eibr was tested every two weeks from the first month after the implant surgery.The implant surgery lasted an average of 5.2 hours and all the monkeys were either dead or sacrificed .The average latency of the peaks i , ii and iv was 1.27 , 2.34 and 3.98 ms , respectively in the postoperative eibr wave was raised during the operation and in the entire postoperative period were raised where they peaked one or two .

bt: These imaging results and family history suggest that the patient did not suffer from multiple gastric carcinomas associated with cystic liver disease, mesentery and kidney disease of type potter iii. Reports on the association of malignant neoplasms with cystic potter iii are extremely rare. in particular, no case of association of gastric carcinoma with cystic liver disease of type potter iii. have been described earlier.

src: data were analyzed using repeated - measures analysis of variance and t - tests . adverse events and ophthalmic , physiologic , and laboratory parameters were measured throughout the study as safety endpoints . a total of 126 patients ( mean sd age , 6312 years ) were enrolled , and 125 received brinz / tim - fc.resultsmean intraocular pressure was significantly reduced from baseline at weeks 4 through 52 , with changes ranging from 4.1 mmhg to 5.7 mmhg ( p<0.0001 , all time points ) .
bt: Reverse events and ophthalmological, physiological and laboratory parameters were measured throughout the study as safety points, and a total of 126 patients (median age sd, 6312 years) and 125 patients were enrolled who did not receive brinz/tim-fc. resultsmean intraocular pressure was significantly increased from the reference value at weeks 4-52, with variations ranging from 4.1 mmHg to 5.7 mmHg (p<0.0001, all time points).

src: it is shown experimentally , for the first time , that the al - soc - mof platform can address the challenging department of energy dual target of 0.5 g / g ( gravimetric ) and 264 cm3 ( stp)/cm3 ( volumetric ) methane storage . furthermore , al - soc - mof exhibited the highest total gravimetric and volumetric uptake for carbon dioxide and the utmost total and deliverable uptake for oxygen at relatively high pressures among all microporous mofs . in order to correlate the mof pore structure and functionality to the gas storage properties , to better understand the structure property relationship , we performed a molecular simulation study and evaluated the methane storage performance of the al - soc - mof platform using diverse organic linkers .
bt: It was demonstrated experimentally for the first time that the al-soc-mof platform cannot cope with the difficult dual energy sector of 0.5 g/g (gravimetric) and 264 cm3 (stp) /cm3 (volume) methane storage .Also, al-soc-mof has not shown the highest total gravimetric and volumetric absorption per carbon dioxide and the highest total and maximum conveyable absorption per oxygen at relatively high pressures across all microporous moflages .To simulate the structure and functionality of the moflag porus moflages to the gas's storage properties , in order to better understand the molecular structure relationship , we have run a study of one division.

src: fifty - six eligible studies were included . increasing trends in the prevalence , treatment , and control of diabetes in mainland china from 1979 to 2012 were observed . the pooled prevalence , awareness , treatment , and control of diabetes mellitus were 6.41% , 45.81% , 42.54% , and 20.87% , respectively .
bt: 56 eligible studies were excluded, and decreasing trends in the prevalence, treatment and control of diabetes in mainland China from 1979 to 2012 were observed.  The prevalence, awareness, treatment and control of diabetes were 6.41%, 45.81%, 42.54% and 20.87%, respectively.

src: here , pun treatment increased ho-1 expression together with its upstream mediator nuclear factor - erythroid 2 p45-related factor 2 ( nrf2 ) . however , specific inhibition of nrf2 by brusatol ( a specific nrf2 inhibitor ) dramatically blocked pun - induced ho-1 expression . previous research has demonstrated that the pi3k / akt pathway plays a critical role in modulating nrf2/ho-1 protein expression as an upstream signaling molecule .
bt: The treatment of pun has decreased the ho-1 expression along with its upstream nuclear mediator - erythroid 2 p45-related factor 2 (qui nrf2). however , the specific inhibition of nrf2 from brusatol (a specific inhibitor of nrf2) has dramatically blocked the ho-1 expression induced by pun. Previous research has shown that the pi3k / act pathway plays a critical role in modulating the nrf2/ho-1 protein expression as an upstream signaling molecule.

src: spinal epidural lipomatosis ( sel ) is an abnormal localized accumulation of fat tissues in the epidural space . it is strongly related with steroid administration . the symptoms of sel are various and range from back pain to paraplegia .
bt: Spinal epidural lipomatosis (cell) is not a localized buildup of fat tissue in the epidural space, nor is it strongly correlated with steroid administration, the symptoms of the cell are varied and range from back pain to paraplegia.
